Tenacity.Dialogue: That which holds sturdy. Training turns the body to rock. Fan Translation: A very solid object. With training, turns your body into a solid rock.

Meditation.Dialogue: A brief, silent moment. Man comes to know his origin. Fan Translation: In a moment of silence, people may know their own origins.

Technique.Dialogue: Upholder of civilization.  Technology is the possibility of man. Fan Translation: Bearers of civilization. Techniques are the possibilities of people.

Preemption.Dialogue: Always be one step ahead, or someone else will be a step ahead of you. Fan Translation: Go before those you command. If you do, then you will control the land afterwards.

Destruction.Dialogue: Fall of ruin, for the time of new birth comes. Fan Translation: Destruction.  The time of birth arrives.

Flash.Dialogue: An insight of an instant, fast as lightning, this slash shall split the heavens. Fan Translation: An insight of an instant, fast as lightning, this slash shall split the heavens.

Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 5%.
MLB Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 10%.
Pleasant Chance.Dialogue: Chance comes but once in a lifetime.   Don't miss the opportunity. Fan Translation: A once-in-a-lifetime chance. You must not let it slip away.

Plentiful Harvest.Dialogue: Harvest season. Rejoice, and give thanks to the Earth.

Concentration.Dialogue: Devote thyself to one purpose.   Nothing is impossible to a willing heart. Fan Translation: 一Single-mindedly. When there is a will, there is a way.

Divine Oracle.Dialogue: Divine inspiration. The truth is known to me. Fan Translation: Divine inspiration. The truth is known to me.

Azoth Blade.Dialogue: Basic Mystic Code for a mage.  A dagger used in ceremonies. Fan Translation: A basic blade carried by all Magic users, to be used in rituals.

False Attendant's Writings.Dialogue: A book that entrusts the power of a Master to another. Its creation requires one Command Spell.

The Blue Black Keys.Dialogue: Closer to an arrow than a sword.  The key of divine providence, which purifies the body and returns it to dust. Fan Translation: More akin to an arrow than to a sword.  A key of divine providence, it purifies flesh and returns it to being dust once more.

The Green Black Keys.Dialogue: Modeled from a cross, this exorcist's tool is used to contact the spirit world. Fan Translation: A variety of talisman utilised in performing exorcisms that prioritises spiritual interference. Modeled on the holy cross.

The Red Black Keys.Dialogue: Black Keys flung into an enemy's flesh. Thrown using a method for armor piercing.

Rin's Pendant.Dialogue: A pendant passed down in the Tohsaka family.  The highest possible class of jewel, endowed with magical energy from generations of Tohsaka mages.

Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 15%.
MLB Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 20%.
Grimoire.Dialogue: A book containing the secrets of magecraft.  Also a record of the life of its author. Fan Translation: Both a tome that chronicles the secrets of thaumaturgy, and a record of the life of the magus who transcribed them.

Ley Line.Dialogue: Magical energy channeled through the earth.  A leyline is the heartbeat of a single, gigantic lifeform. Fan Translation: Magical energy flowing through the earth. A ley line is the heartbeat of life.

Magic Crystal.Dialogue: A jewel used as a catalyst by gem mages.

Dragonkind.Dialogue: The strongest phantasmal species.  It has vast power, and creates magical energy just by breathing.

Steel Training.Dialogue: Faith is the proof of who we are. Belief turns the body to steel.

Primeval Magic.Dialogue: A simple spell which benefits you by harming another. Hence primeval.

Projection.Dialogue: Gradation Air. A type of magecraft that utilizes magical energy to create a mirror image of one's self. Fan Translation: Structural Grasping. A branch of magecraft that utilizes magical energy to reproduce duplicates of an original from the caster's mental image.

Gandr.Dialogue: One of the rune spells passed down in Northern Europe.A type of curse that can reduce the target's physical capability.If the magical energy is highly condensed, it could have the same firepower as a bullet. Fan Translation: A variety of runic magecraft, passed down in northern regions.A curse with a debilitating effect on its target's bodily functions.When composed with particularly densely-packed magical energy, it can strike with the force of a bullet.

Verdant Sound of Destruction.Dialogue: Nature's newborn cries: O Mana that's all around us, give us your power. Fan Translation: The child of nature calls.Mana-laden atmosphere, rage forth.

Gem Magecraft / Antumbra.Dialogue: The moon in the night casts a reflection on the lake's surface.The two sisters enhance each other's power.

Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 25%.
MLB Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 30%.
Be Elegant.Dialogue: Noblesse oblige.The ruling class should always be elegant.

Imaginary Number Magecraft.Dialogue: A special type of magecraft.A forbidden spell that lays the subconscius bare and turns its negative side to a blade.

Divine Banquet.Dialogue: Blessings to the Grail.The newborns offer their worship to their lord, life.

Angel's Song.Dialogue: Blessings unto the Heaven. A phantasm becomes purer upon receiving a pure wish.

Formal Craft.Dialogue: Mastery of the basics is proof of one's superiority.A beautiful, elegant Average One, who rules over Earth, Water, Fire, Wind, and Ether. Fan Translation: Fundamentals are the very proof of excellence.She who makes an offering of all five elements, the graceful and magnificent Average One.

Imaginary Around (CE).Dialogue: Imagination is proof of one's freedom. The imaginary numbers of shadow dance spritely upon the wind. Fan Translation: Fantasy is the proof of freedom.Once shadow, Imaginary Numbers now becomes a gentle gust of wind that races weightlessly past.

Limited / Zero Over.Dialogue: Convergence is proof of one's ideals. As you hammer the blade upon the anvil, you burn thyself all the more brightly. Fan Translation: Convergence is the proof of the ideal.As if forging a sword, as if burning up your own life, you will continue to strike steel.

Kaleidoscope.Dialogue: A great marshal of magic.Guardian of many possibilities and many futures. Their existence is like a kaleidoscope. Fan Translation: The grand marshal of sorcery.That person acts as the defender of countless futures, countless possibilities. That existence is the same as a kaleidoscope.

Heaven's Feel.Dialogue: Blessings unto humanity. Wishes will accept all fantasies and become a miracle. Now is the time for the body to free itself of its bonds.

MLB Effect: Friend Points obtained by support becomes +75
Beginning of the Journey.Dialogue: Blessings upon thy way. While it be long, may it be worth the journey.

Parted Sea.Dialogue: Look to the horizon. Sometimes men call that shining hope a miracle.

Sealing Designation - Enforcer.Dialogue: The beginning has passed. With fist of iron protect the laws of the world of magecraft, and guard its most secret treasures.

Holy Shroud of Magdalene.Dialogue: Noli me tangere. It is in the shadows of exorcisms that a saint may be proven. Fan Translation: Noli me tangere. It is precisely in the mud of exorcism, where proof of a Saint is set.

Effect: Charges NP gauge by 8% every turn.
MLB Effect: Charges NP gauge by 10% every turn.
Prisma Cosmos.Dialogue: It is still in its infancy, but hope reaches to infinity.When someday it takes flight, its growth shall recognize many and heal many.

Effect: Grants Guts status for 1 time. (Revives with 500 HP)
MLB Effect: Grants Guts status for 1 time. (Revives with 1000 HP)
Nightless Rose.Dialogue: They say that dawn comes to every night, but some nights never end. Behold, the glory illuminates the city, and in the end it summons her.

Effect: Increases Buster, Arts and Quick performance by 3%.
MLB Effect: Increases Buster, Arts and Quick performance by 5%.
Mooncell Automaton.Dialogue: This is a story that could've happened. One that doesn't exist in our world.  At the bottom of the lunar sea, list a treasure beyond seven trials.  A pseudo-spiritron brain formed of light recreates every miracle. Fan Translation: It is from an "if" story not of this world.  At the bottom of the depths of the moon's sea, it is the treasure of seven trials.  A fake spirit of light used to recreate every miracle.

Moony Jewel.Dialogue: Now we move to a lost house. Amidst the moonlight, a girl's smile shines like a jewel. Fan Translation: Now, in the lost house. Against the moonlight, the girl's smile shines like a jewel.

Bath of the Lunar Goddess.Dialogue: In the age of myth, it's said that the moon goddess purified herself in the spring after hunting. No peeking, even if you aren't into girls. Consider yourself lucky if she gets mad, because if she falls in love, you're screwed... Her love could weigh heavier than the moon!

Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 15%.
MLB Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 20%.
Moonlight Festival.Dialogue: Smack, smack. As the moonlight shines on the water surface, a strange hero is making the rice cake. An unusual moon festival proceeds apace in a rift between worlds... Fan Translation: (Sounds of a hammer striking Mochi) On the moon reflected on the surface of the water, a mysterious hero makes Mochi.The bizarre moon's celebration is hectic, progressing between worlds......

Runestone.Dialogue: Colorful natural stones carved with runes.  As if you are gathering the falling stars, you are picking up the fragments of good fortune. Fan Translation: A rune with multiple colors carved in natural stone. For those who collect what was visibly scattered by the light, A fragment of fortune will be picked up.

With One Strike.Dialogue: The first move in anything is important, so make it a bold one!Your first strike might reach all the way to the moon!This is the beginning of the teaching of Sowa.

The Black Grail.Dialogue: An illusion seen by a man haunted by justice. The corrupted Grail speaks. It says a price is required for what he seeks. Just like the maiden of fate, singing of love.

Jack o'Lantern.Dialogue: The lanterns that decorate the area below Castle Csejte.  These trees, decorated with dolls that look like the castle's owner, are not just for show.  They also have the power to drive away evil spirits.  ...Possibly.

Trick or Treat.Dialogue: Even the biggest nuisance can be the beginning of a wonderful encounter, and with the laughter of us girls, we can drive away any monster!

Effect: Draws attention of all enemies. (1 turn.)
MLB Effect: Draws attention of all enemies. (1 turn.)
Halloween Arrangement.Dialogue: Chaldea is currently undergoing renovations... The Halloween party preparations are coming along nicely. We're ready for anyone tonight.

Halloween Princess.Dialogue: A terrifying demoness who appears each night in your dreams... ...is the costume that this princess of a winter castle wears for her party. It seems like she's mistaken "spooky" with "sexy"...

Halloween Petite Devil.Dialogue: Little demons dance on Halloween night. Blessings for the pretty horns, blessings for the cute wings. Now, how many steps until showtime?

Maid in Halloween.Dialogue: A wild maid on a crazy adventure!  Liven up your Halloween party with homemade pumpkin & undead-kitty candy! Make sure to clean your plate, my (potential) Master!

And So The Ship Conquers.Dialogue: A ship from the Age of Gods that carried many Heroic Spirits.  What lay at the end of its journey, victory or plunder?  Glory and ruin are like a gold coin spinning in the air. Fan Translation: A vessel ferrying numerous warriors of ages past. Is the voyage for victory or for plunder?  Glory and ruin are like a gold coin dancing in the air.

Code Cast.Dialogue: A new type of Magecraft used during the Moon Holy Grail War. Created by the most brilliant mages of the time, it ensured that at least some aspects of the mystical and the arcane would once again have their place in the spiritron world. Fan Translation: A new magic used during the Holy Grail War of the Moon Cell. By the hands of modern magicians, the mysterious shine of the world of spiritrons was reclaimed.

Victor of the Moon.Dialogue: The weakest is destined to challenge the strongest. Hence, the Holy Grail War that occurred within the Serial Phantasm. The nameless one, you, emerged victorious. Don't ask about the yakisoba bread. Fan Translation: ---The weakest things will eventually be challenged by the strongest things. The Holy Grail war takes place in the society of the imaginary spiritron. The victor certainly has no name, and exists only as "you". Don't ask about the Yakisoba Bread.

Another Ending.Dialogue: Another possibility exists for the Moon Holy Grail. Yet, knowing what lies at the end of your journey, you have continued anyway. Believe in the future beyond your wish, and what it could bring. Also, believe in the premium cake roll. Fan Translation: Yet another possibility that exists within the Holy Grail of the moon. You chose to continue walking this path, even while knowing the conclusion that lay at its end. Believe in the future that awaits beyond your wish. Believe it will someday be realised. Believe also in premium roll cake.

Fate GUDAGUDA Order.Dialogue: Nobu: "Sure there aren't too many characters?"  Okita: "This is a celebration! A celebration!"

Effect: Increases Buster and Quick performance by 10%.
MLB Effect: Increases Buster and Quick performance by 15%.
Launch Order!.Dialogue: At last the day has come when these two can fight together. Congratulations, Sakura Saber.Congratulations, Demon Archer. We pray that your dream may never end...!

Gudao.Dialogue: Nobu: "This isn't a card, it's a manga..." Okita: "What if we can't read it?" Nobu: "It can't be helped!"

Effect: Draws attention of all enemies. (3 turns.)
MLB Effect: Draws attention of all enemies. (3 turns.)
GUDAGUDA Poster Girl.Dialogue: Causality is disrupted... and greedy plots are hatched... In this dimension, it's inconceivable that a Servant would work in a modern cafe. So this must be someone's plot.  To solve this mystery, we set out upon the road. Next time: lazy flowers bloom in the streets of Tokyo!

Craft Essence EXP Card: Okita.Dialogue: Add this and your Craft Essence will level up! Looks like a great card, huh? What? But I'll disappear? Noooo!

Craft Essence EXP Card: Nobu.Dialogue: Your Craft Essence will level up with this card! Pretty good deal, huh? ...What? I'll disappear? Hmmm...

Demon Boar.Dialogue: It devours flesh, it devours armor, it devours even runes. This boar has become reckless death itself. It can catch a hero or even a dragon offguard. Pray there are no hesitant spearman in the woods tonight. Even now, the forest of massacre echoes with the regrets of heroes.

Knight's Pride.Dialogue: As men age, so do beliefs. The old knight says there are no wrong choices. If there's one thing to be called a mistake, it would be to regret your choice, and turn your eyes away from it. ...I beseech you, when I die, lay my body to rest beneath a yew tree.

Fragments of 2030.Dialogue: A sage in a white coat sorrows, and asks, "Is it time once again to harvest humanity?" He believes that at the moment when life and death intersect, something is born within humanity that is worth this plunder.

Lightning Reindeer.Dialogue: People call me the lightning-fast reindeer tank!  I promise delivery within one day of your letter.  I can also stand in as a Christmas tree, so hurry up and order yours today!

Effect: Charges NP gauge by 3% every turn.
MLB Effect: Charges NP gauge by 4% every turn.
March of the Saints.Dialogue: Even if it's just a one night part-time job, and even if it's something you're terrible at, once you've got the hat on, you're Santa. Santa Claus is coming to town!

Present for My Master.Dialogue: The battle continues, but at least tonight, let's make things romantic.Put your feelings into your present, and..."Merry Christmas, Master!"

Holy Night Sign.Dialogue: A tiny exchange of goodwill creates a warm miracle.As everyone watches their breath turn white in the air, they head for home, wreathes in the hand. To my beloved, blessings on this holy night.

Effect: Charges NP gauge by 2% every turn.
MLB Effect: Charges NP gauge by 3% every turn.
Clock Tower.Dialogue: The de-facto headquarters of the Mage's Association, a major power in the world of magecraft.  Many famed mages acquired their knowledge behind its walls, however, behind the glory of its long-standing history, darkness lurks in the shadows. Fan Translation: The headquarters of the Mage's Association and a large force in the magic world. A schoolhouse from where many magi of renown appear one after the other, but there is an obscure darkness behind the scenes of its long history.

Effect: 50% Chance to grant Guts status when defeated.
MLB Effect: 50% Chance to grant Guts status when defeated.
Necromancy.Dialogue: A type of magecraft that processes, makes use of, and commands the dead.In the world of mages, there are many spells that should be avoided, but this man uses without hesitation."Even if this life ends without any achievements, its death will not be wasted." The man says as if mocking himself.

Effect: 60% Chance to charge NP gauge by 12% every turn.
MLB Effect: 60% Chance to charge NP gauge by 15% every turn.
Awakened Will.Dialogue: I want to save the people I care about. This wish of mine is engraved deep inside my soul. They can laugh at my mediocrity, but my will shall not waver. Even if this wish is just an illusion, filled with contradiction.

Effect: Seals enemy's NP for 2 turns and inflicts
Curse with 1000 damage for 10 turns to them when defeated.
MLB Effect: Seals enemy's NP for 2 turns and inflicts
Curse with 2000 damage for 10 turns to them when defeated.
500 Years Dedication.Dialogue: Once, there was a man with a great desire. But the passage of time turned all he had into something twisted.His appearance, his soul, and then, his wish itself.

Peacefulness of 2016.Dialogue: Even as the Grand Order continues, one must take a break during the New Year. While the good Doctor is worrying about humanity's survival, he has encountered one of mankind's greatest creations. Oh the sinful one, its name is KOTATSU!

Heroic New Year.Dialogue: The Red-painted arrow wards off evil spirits and energies, as the guardian beast stares fearlessly into the rising sun.May blessings be upon those who fight bravely against destiny.

Law of the Jungle.Dialogue: The king of the jungle, awakened from his slumber shall bring down his hammer on arrogant humans. Civilization is powerless and meaningless when facing nature's wrath. Fan Translation: Having woken up from a long sleep, the king of the jungle brings down the hammer on the arrogant mankind. When facing the fury of Mother Nature, civilization will just be mercilessly trampled.

Effect: Draws attention of all enemies. (1 turn.)
MLB Effect: Draws attention of all enemies. (1 turn.)
Grand New Year.Dialogue: Happy New Year! New clothes, new decorations, and new adventures. There are many exciting things to come for this year, but for her, she only has one wish... May this next year be a wonderful one for my Master.

Mona Lisa.Dialogue: This one portrait is said to be mankind's greatest treasure. With numerous theories and mysterious surrounding her, she continues to capture the heart of tens of thousands of people. The ideal beauty beloved by an unparalled genius. What kind of secret hides behind that smile......

Happy x3 Order.Dialogue: A Saber, a Ruler, a Shielder, and a little lion dancer. The three beautiful girls and a small creature bid Master one Happy New Year.

Effect: Increases NP damage by 5% every turn. (Max: 40%.)
MLB Effect: Increases NP damage by 5% every turn. (Max: 50%.)
Purely Bloom.Dialogue: With an endless ideal in her heart, she will be strong.One day, may this journey serve as harbor for her many dreams.

Effect: Grants Guts status for 1 time. (Revives with 1 HP.)
MLB Effect: Grants Guts status for 1 time. (Revives with 1 HP.)
Star of Artoria.Dialogue: Excalibur does not differentiate.Lily, follow this path of glory laid down by the Mysterious Heroine X, until one day you may grasp the Star of Only one.The Journey of Flowers my be difficult, but don't give up, Lily! March forth, Lily! ...But, is this really ok?

Trueshot.Dialogue: The form is beautiful, like a carefully woven dress.As long as the arrow is fired straight, it will hit the target.Striving to become one with the arrow, those on this path train tirelessly each day. But sometimes, you just need a break to play some games.

Effect: 65% Chance to recover 750 HP every turn.
MLB Effect: 65% Chance to recover 1000 HP every turn.
Mikotto! Bride Training.Dialogue: No matter what it is, preparation is the most important part. To make miso soup, you have to make the stock from scratch. Kind and careful, one soup and three dishes is the key to a healthy life. This is all for my Master. Willingness to do anything is the proof of a good wife.

Land of Shadow's Crimson Lotus.Dialogue: Queen of the Land of Shadows, she excelled at both martial arts and magecraft.Many young warriors gathered in hope of becoming her direct disciple.The wise and powerful Queen, strict and uncompromising, she said this to those who gathered seeking her knowledge: "Try to overcome death with all your might. Remember, it's do or die for almost every situation.Don't be too gloomy about it, think on the bright side.You will only die if you don't succeed."

Craft Essence EXP Card: Mysterious Subst.Dialogue: A mysterious substance from Mysterious Heroine X's ship. It's filled with mysterious energies that can power up Craft Essences. No Pollution, No Risk, No Tesla. Although it seems to be some kind of fuel but it actually tastes quite delicious. This is too good to be true, it must be a dream! It was a dream.

A mysterious substance from Mysterious Heroine X's ship. It's filled with mysterious energies that can power up Craft Essences. By letting the spherical matter in the middle to dip into Liquid 1 through Liquid 5 in order, it will form something. Depending on how you look at it, it might be grotesque. It was grotesque.

Ry\u016bd\u014d Temple.Dialogue: It's known as the local sightseeing spot among the public, but, for mages, it's a temple considered as truly sacred.However, for that reason, the witch who has settled into this place as her base has turned it into her own "Workshop."

Magic Meter.Dialogue: It will detect magical energy over a certain threshold and point to its source. In order to trigger the sensor, an abnormal amount of magical energy must be present, and at its source... something absolutely abnormal.

Elixir of Love.Dialogue: The elixir created by a mage who excels at controlling one's mind. Even the Servant can't resist its effect. However, use it with caution. Your hidden desire will become an uncontrollable weapon and it will burn you and everything you love to ashes.

Storch Ritter.Dialogue: Einzbern's wirework. An angel's poem will echo through the freezing night. Familiars created with wires and hairs will autonomously capture and attack the enemy. "Storch Ritter" in the bird shape and many other forms exist.

Hermitage.Dialogue: Arannya, Arannya. Training and meditation must be done in a remote land. The way of the Buddha is equally harsh no matter of your age, but also equally generous. Fan Translation: Aranya, aranya. Asceticism and meditation, practiced in a remote and peaceful place. No matter how young the disciple, the path of Buddhism is equally harsh, and equally lenient.

Motored Cuirassier.Dialogue: A large motorcycle, armed with the magical energy converted from the King of Knights. This machine's specs and performance have far exceed that of conventional motorcycles, and is able to catch up to the speed of a divine beast, commanded by the King of Conquerors. The modification is overkilled, yet perfect.

Effect: When defeated, recovers party's HP by 800.
MLB Effect: When defeated, recovers party's HP by 1000.
Stuffed Lion.Dialogue: Reminder of the far traveled dream.

Lugh's Halo.Dialogue: The wheel of sunlight sent by the God of Light, Lugh. It instantly dried up the bottomless swamp in the Land of Shadows, and left a path made of fire which allowed passage for the Child of Light.

Vessel of the Saint.Dialogue: A girl whose body Ruler inhabited during a certain Holy Grail War.A devoted follower with unwavering faith, and a sensitive girl with a heart filled with kindness. Eventually, what she feels in her heart will become the motivation for the Saint. But what is the reflection in that mirror?

Effect: Increases Max HP by 200 every turn. (Max: 3000.)
MLB Effect: Increases Max HP by 300 every turn. (Max: 3000.)
Golden Millenium Tree.Dialogue: Glory will never die.  Our will shall be resurrected.  Just like the tree of Yggdrasil.  In order to welcome the next millennium, the head of Yggdmillenia will lend his hand.  Victory will be on our side.

Heroic Spirit Portrait: Mashu Kyrielight.Dialogue: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned, and lives within this girl. Wielding an imperfect yet protective shield, she will join the fight for humanity.

Heroic Spirit Portrait: Artoria Pendrago.Dialogue: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned. The King of Knights, honest and just. She holds a sacred sword brimming with the radiance of the planet. Fan Translation: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned.The King of Knights, honest and just.She holds a sacred sword brimming with the radiance of the Star.

Heroic Spirit Portrait: Jeanne d'Arc.Dialogue: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned.  In a world reduced to ashes, her flag will be the beacon of hope. Fan Translation: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned.  In a world reduced to ashes, her flag will be the beacon of hope.

Heroic Spirit Portrait: Altera.Dialogue: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned. Her eyes are filled with emptiness and doubt. With the sword of destruction in hand, she will search for the meaning of victories.

Heroic Spirit Portrait: Arjuna.Dialogue: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned. An expert of archery with a divine bow. As long as he's recognized as a hero, he will continue to remain as so. However...

Heroic Spirit Portrait: Sc\u00e1thach.Dialogue: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned. A queen who disappeared into the Land of Shadows, the one who surpassed all humanity. But with humanity's survival in jeopardy, this crimson legend shall be revived once more.

Heroic Spirit Portrait: Ushiwakamaru.Dialogue: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned. There will be a future at the end of the road. This is why the talented young warrior will not look back and dash full speed ahead.

Heroic Spirit Portrait: Henry Jekyll & H.Dialogue: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned. Both the power of stealth and madness resides within him. This internal struggle is endless, but the young man will keep fighting to grasp his own future.

Heroic Spirit Portrait: Mephistopheles.Dialogue: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned. The evil clown laughs. Because the world is filled with sadness, cruelty, and just too much joy.

Heroic Spirit Portrait: Darius III.Dialogue: Answering to the call of the Grand Order, a Servant is summoned. Where is my rival? Trapped by madness, what is in the heart of this once king?

Effect: Charges NP gauge by 3% every turn.
MLB Effect: Charges NP gauge by 5% every turn.
Valentine Dojo of Tears.Dialogue: "My first Craft Essence! Valentine, no less!...But what the hell is this treatment?" "Osu! Now that it's come to this, why don't we pulverize the Valentine in a lovely, cute way?" "Ah...If it's going to be this bitter, then I don't need any chocolate!"

Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 15%.
MLB Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 20%.
Kitchen \u2606 P\u00e2tissi\u00e8res.Dialogue: The patissiere sisters are having a blast making chocolate for the first time! It will be complete once they've written messages to their favorite friends, Daddy, and Mommy with their chocolate pen.  Now that's a true Valentine, after all, romances are so impure.  …But who's going to clean this up? Fan Translation: The two pâtissier sisters' long-awaited foray into chocolate-making! Finish off writing the messages to papa, mama and our friends with the chocolate pen, and it's done. This is what Valentine's Day should really be about! All that vulgar love affair nonsense is so crude! ...but, who's going to clean all this up?

Effect: Increases Arts and Quick performance by 10%.
MLB Effect: Increases Arts and Quick performance by 15%.
Street Choco-Maid.Dialogue: Give Me, Love Me!Valentine's Day, a wonderful day full of love.  Even short dresses like these will be forgiven.  True love, close friends, or even just acquaintances.  No matter what the reason is, the chocolate will be equally sweet.  You there, why don't you take one?  ※ Please kindly keep your hands off the maids.

Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 10%.
MLB Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 20%.
Melty Sweetheart.Dialogue: I'm going to give this chocolate, suffused with my love, to someone dear to me. My cheery feelings are heart-shaped.  The taste of romance, melting and spreading out. Fan Translation: With all your feelings for your beloved, deliver that chocolate with all your might. Your buoyant feelings in the shape of a heart.The melting, spreading taste of love.

Chaldea Standard.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Mash Kyrielight.  After 17 rounds of trial and error, and 27 trips to the Singularity to gather ingredients, this is finally complete.  Happy Valentine's Day, Master. Fan Translation: Valentine's chocolate from Mashu Kyrielight. After failing 17 times, I had to go into the singularity 27 times to find all the ingredients.  Happy Valentine's Day, Master.

Crown Saber.Dialogue: Valentines chocolate from Altria Pendragon. With all my thanks for all that you do. This royal taste and style is for you.

Crown Saber Morgan.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Altria Pendragon (Alter).  It's hard to express gratitude in words and attitude. The most powerful Servant has come to steal the most powerful Master. Don't think that your Valentine will knock on your door a second time. This junky taste and style is for you. Fan Translation: Valentine's chocolate from Artoria Pendragon (Alter) (Saber). My gratitude is hard to convey with mere words and attitude. From the strongest Servant to the strongest Master. You don't need to come knocking on my door twice this Valentine. I offer you think junk food flavored snack.

Ranch Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Altria Pendragon (Lily). I've modeled this after my favorite thing! May this carry my feelings to you. Fan Translation: Valentine's chocolate from Artoria Pendragon (Lily). I made this based on the one thing I love the most! I filled this with all my feelings, for you!

Imperial Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Nero Claudius. I made this myself! The laurel wreath is the symbol of the Roman emperor, you know. You'd better keep that in mind as you gnash your teeth on that chocolate! Fan Translation: I made this by myself! The laurel wreath is a symbol of a Roman Emperor. I succeeded, but be sure to chew on this chocolate properly while you eat.

Enrober Photon.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Altera. ...The insides are edible. I'm sure of it. Fan Translation: …………The contents are edible. I'm sure of it.

Maxim de Chevalier.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Chevalier d'Eon. I have this one favorite shop in Paris... Just one bite of their food, and you will be completely hooked! That's the flavor that I was hoping for. Do you think I did a good job? Fan Translation: In Paris, my favorite shop was selling something that would instantly captivate you with just a bite...... I'm trying to recreate it, so I was wondering if I did just fine?

Victory Rose.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Boudica. Sorry it's so big. Really. Uh, but look...that means that I was able to stuff more love into it. How's that? Don't eat it in one go. You can leave some for later, okay? Fan Translation: I'm sorry that it came out so big. Hmm, that's right..... I filled it with all my love, you see? Try not to eat it all in one go, it's fine to have some leftovers.

Yatsuhashi Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Okita Souji. I, Okita Souji, went to line up at a famous sweets shop early this morning to get this chocolate for you, Master! Don't you love this Shinsengumi-style wrapping paper, too? Fan Translation: Ms. Okita has lined up early at a famous confectionary store to buy this limited chocolate, Master! The Shinsengumi collab wrapping paper makes you happy, right?

Strawberry and Thunder Crunch Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Mordred. Isn't it deliciously crunchy? But next time, go buy some yourself! Next year? Well, I guess it can't be helped. If I remember next year, that is! Fan Translation: It's crunchy and it's good! You should buy one for yourself next time! Next year? I guess I have no choice, if I remember by next year!

May Breeze.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Nero Claudius (Bride). Yes, I made this myself! Our wedding is still a ways off, but here, take this sweet banquet! Fan Translation: Of course, I made this by myself! There's still some time until the wedding, but you can have this sweet bouquet!

Apple Arrow Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's Chocolate from Atalante. You may have this. Feel free to use the apple against me in a race, if you want... But be prepared if you do. That's what it means to defeat me. Fan Translation: ────You can have this. Feel free to use this against me during a footrace. ......Are you prepared though? You should know the consequences for defeating me.

Snake Chocolate (Low Effort).Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Euryale. Love? Of course there's no love in this. I only made it because I felt like it. Random? Of course it would be! Humph! Fan Translation: Love? Like I'd make anything with that. This thing only needed my minimal effort. Of course, I only put in minimal effort. Hmph.

HELP.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Orion. It's as if this chocolate statue is trying to say something... Fan Translation: Looks like this chocolate statue is trying to tell me something...

Inevitable Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Oda Nobunaga. When you split this skeleton chocolate vertically, like this... Look, you can turn it into a mask! Hahahahaha! Pretty neat, don't you think? ...Huh? Why are you looking at me like that? Fan Translation: When you split this skeleton chocolate vertically, like this... Look, you can turn it into a mask! Hahahahaha! Pretty neat, don't you think? ...Huh? Why are you looking at me like that?

Octo Octo Maiden.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Elisabeth Báthory. I am going to cover this with my gratitude for you and make demon-warding, charm-flavored sweets for you. Which means...it's got to be an octopus! ...That's what you do for Valentine's Day, right? Fan Translation: My gratitude manifesting in physical form, with a flavor that dispels curses─── In other words, it's an octopus! That's what Valentine's Day is all about, right?

Bitter Pitch Black.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Scathach. ...One strike, one kill. Fan Translation: ──────One-hit kill.

World's End White.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Altria Pendragon (Alter)  Beyond the sweetness, you'll find what's beyond your consciousness.  I suggest you keep that in mind when you take a bite of it. Fan Translation: Sweetness from the ends of the world. Anyway, you may want to brace yourself while eating that.

Crystallized Wisdom Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Brynhild. See, it's perfect for you... I used runes to freeze it, so it will never melt again. You can display it eternally, or you can eat it immediately. ...Oh, I'm sorry. If you eat it, you may get a stomach ache. Fan Translation: See, it looks perfect on you...... I used ice runes to freeze this, so it will never melt. Display it for eternity, or eat it right away. ......Oh, I'm sorry. Eating it might destroy your stomach.

Brand Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Medusa. It's not much, but please accept this gift. I get the feeling that you're always catching me in a humiliating moment, but one must always want to engage in love or battle in style, right? Fan Translation: It may not be much, but please take this. Even though you keep seeing my embarassing side, I want you to see my cool side as well, be it in love or battle.

Choco-Flavored Usumidori.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Ushiwakamaru. All right, please have some of this. The taste is as sharp as can be! If you'd like, we can go chop some heads together sometime! Fan Translation: Now then, you can have this! The sharpness is as excellent as its flavor! If you want, we can go head-hunting together!

Royal White Steed.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Marie Antoinette. Oh, is this what you call a message card? Is it like a letter, I wonder? All right, then... Let's see... Good afternoon. Please enjoy my utmost feelings for you. Fan Translation: Oh my, is this a message card? I wonder if it's like a letter. Well then, let's see─── Have a nice day. This is the least to show my affection, so please enjoy.

Homemade Cookies and Object X.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolates from Martha. You don't remember anything, do you? No. No. I don't blame you... These are just some sweets baked by a humble town girl, but please have some if you like. Fan Translation: You really don't remember anything? Uh, huh. I didn't...... Oh no, it was nothing. These are chocolates from a town girl, please have some if you like.

Mug Bonbon.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Francis Drake. Here! It's pretty sweet, but here you go. I hear it's a good idea to give things you like to the people dear to you, so I've put a lot of brandy jelly inside it! Fan Translation: Hey, it's a bit sweet but have some. I'm supposed to make it for my most beloved person, and fill it with all my love. So I filled it with my beloved brandy jelly!

Treasure Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Anne Bonny & Mary Read. What? I'm supposed to write a message? S=sure thing. Uh... Master, I've tasted this numerous times, so I think it should be safe. I'd be happy if you ate it all. Also, thanks for everything. Someday, I'd like to, um, go on a cruise with you and Anne. What do you think? Fan Translation: A Valentine chocolate from Anne Bonny & Mary Read (Rider). Huh, I have to write a message? F-Fine then. Umm, Dear Master. I already tasted this a bunch of times, so it's probably edible. We'd be happy if you could eat all of this. Also, thank you for everything. One day, Anne, you, the three of us should...... ummm, travel the seas...... together......

Christmas Memories.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Altria Pendragon (Santa Alter). I've stuffed this stocking full of chocolates. You can grab double handfuls and eat away. Is there anything happier in this world? Fan Translation: This stocking is filled with mini chocolates. Just keep reaching for more until you're satisfied. Is there a much better satisfaction than this?

Merry \u2606 Merry.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Medea. To my student who appeared out of this air: Since you can use Valentines as part of your rituals, please keep your nose to the grindstone, and use this as an example. Fan Translation: To my young apprentice. Valentines can also be used to train in magecraft, so stay sharp and keep training. Here's an example for reference.

Pumpkin Maiden.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Elizabeth Báthory (Halloween). come on, I know what Valentine is! It just has to be sweet, hard, and crunchy, right? In that case, this is the right answer! Master, please have some pumpkin sweets! Fan Translation: Of course, I know about Valentines Day! I just have to make something sweet, hard, and crunchy, right? Well then, I got it right all along! Master, please have some of these pumpkin treats.

Chocolat Jewel.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Medea (Lily). Thank you for always looking out for me, Master. It's just a small gift, but please accept my gratitude. Fan Translation: Thank you for always taking care of me, Master. This isn't much, but please take this as a token of my gratitude.

Confectionary Box of the Imperial Court.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Tamamo-no-Mae. Sweets are to be enjoyed with the eyes and tasted with the tongue. Though this is a western custom, I, Tamamo-no-Mae, gave everything I had to create these for you. Please give them, and me, a taste♡ Fan Translation: Cooking is the combination of visual presentation and sensation of flavor─── Even though this is a western tradition, I, Tamamo no Mae, have made this for you. Please think of me as you enjoy your meal. ♡

Powder Sugar Snow Tale.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Nursery Rhyme. A sweet, cold fragment of snow. My gift to you, so warm even on a winter night. From now on and forever, don't ever forget to dream. Fan Translation: Cold powders of sugar snow. This gift of mine to you, may it give warmth through the winter nights. From now and forevermore, never lose your dreaming heart.

Snake Chocolate (with Love).Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Stheno. Yes, I have made this with all the love in my heart. ...Of course it's a lie. Is there a problem? Fan Translation: Yes, I made this with all my love. ......Of course, that was a lie...... Is there a problem?

Knife Chocolate Bitter.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Jing Ke. I made this somewhat bitter, so it'll go well with alcohol. Now let's go grab a drink! I am not letting you go home tonight! Fan Translation: I made this a bit more bitter to match the taste of sake. Well then, why don't we have a drink while we try it out? I'm not letting you go home tonight, you hear?

From Java With Love.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Mata Hari. There are so many things that I want, but more than anything, I want your love, Master. Fan Translation: There are a lot of things that I want, but I want your love more than anything else, Master.

Blood Ruby Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Carmilla. It was not supposed to turn out like that chocolate! It's not my fault! It's the cooking utensils and the ingredients and the weather! But it does taste pretty good...I think. Fan Translation: It's supposed to be a chocolate! It's not my fault! The cooking utensils, the ingredients, and the weather are all to blame! However, the taste should be alright...... I think.

To Mom.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Jack the Ripper. I worked so hard to make this! Praise me! - From Hell Fan Translation: I did my absolute best! Praise me! ──From Hell

Du Stallion Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Mysterious Heroine X. All right, now I'm popular with the kids! Of course, the staff at the chocolate factory are the Sabers other than myself. I'm going to make them learn to sing and dance! Fan Translation: Alright, this will be our best selling product for children! Of course, the chocolate factory will be staffed by all kinds of Sabers except for me. Let's teach them how to sing and dance as well!

Kiyohime in Ribbons.Dialogue: Please go ahead and enjoy this present♪ Come on, come on, come on, come on♡ Fan Translation: Valentine self from Kiyohime. Please hurry, have a taste, and enjoy♪ Come on, come on, come on, come on♡

Wonderful Life.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Tamamo Cat. Now that's a Valentine's chocolate! If this is love, then what is love? I don't know. All I know is that while I was making this, I couldn't have been happier... That's all! I love you so much, Master! Fan Translation: Here comes the super fastball Valentine choco. Is this what they call love, just what is love exactly? I have no idea. One thing's for sure though, making this made me really happy! I love you, Master!

Hexagon Chocobolt.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Frankenstein. (A giant heart sign on a piece of paper.) Fan Translation: (The note that came with this has a large ♡ sign drawn on it)

St. Orleans.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Jeanne d'Arc. For you who always face every challenge head-on and never escape. But, please let me spoil you every once in a while, okay? Fan Translation: For the one who always moves forward and never backs down, this is for you. But please rely on me from time to time, okay?

Decapitating Bunny 2016.Dialogue: One beat, no beat, zero beats! Normally a tough girl, she will pick up her sword once festivals come around. Since she uses the back side of her sword, even if heads go flying, it's all good. The Golden Heroine, Decapitating Bunny, has now encountered you in her all new outfit. "I am a lady, and sometimes I will jump to the moon." Fan Translation: One Beat, No Beat, Zero Rythm! It's the usual rowdy girl but when the carnival starts, she will instantly take up her sword. Heads may fly when striked with the back of the sword, but that's still okay. She's the Gold Heroine, The Head Decapitating Bunny,Feigning upon her new encounters! "I may be a lady, but I do occasionally jump towards the moon☆"

Mature Gentleman.Dialogue: Don't fight anyone, don't hate anyone, don't seek greater success than others, and have a better day than today.  His life is ordinary and harmless.  It's not a compromise born of a setback.  We know how hard it is to try to be like that from the beginning.

Peerless Puppeteer.Dialogue: The highest ranked puppeteer who has received the Sealing Designation. As she's enjoying this current era while escaping the sound of the bell, this mage runs into a fate that's connected to her past. In front of this ritual related to the "Root," what is the meaning of her grief. "So is this telling me to take care of my childhood memories? Tch, what a clever thing to bring out now."

Threefold Barrier.Dialogue: Fugu, Kongou, Dakatsu, Taiten, Chougyou, Ouken. The triple-layered barrier that he's surrounded himself with. As if he's woven a web out of spidering threads covering the ground and all spaces, flat surfaces, and three-dimensional objects. This circle is an unwavering philosophy. Those lacking wisdom, be ashamed.

Vivid Dance of Fists.Dialogue: "AzoLto!"  This is a slightly new type of modern magecraft, a style of fistfighting blended with the sounds of music.  Jab, hook, straight.  Go for the vital spots - the stomach, the jaw, the left cheek.  Dancing to the rhythm, the flames inside the girl are ablaze.

Mystic Eyes of Distortion (CE).Dialogue: Bend, bend, bend... Distort. The repeated words became a curse, twisting and destroying everything within her sight. Fan Translation: Twist, bend, break - let this be a massacre. The mantra repeats again and again, becoming a curse that twists, warps and destroys all within sight.

Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 15%.
MLB Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 20%.
Summer's Futuresight.Dialogue: The information acquired through sight and hearing. A prediction of the future created through intellect. Precognition, an ability to combine all this information and make it into reality. It's not they can see "a future after a few minutes," but rather observe a reality with "results after a few minutes." Fan Translation: The information originally acquired by means of vision and hearing. The prospect, expectations that the intellect has towards the future. Precognition is when these unify and are enhanced to the point of hard fact. They are not seeing the "future of a few minutes later", but rather looking into the "consequence of a few minutes later" that reality creates.

Effect: Increases critical star absorption by 300%. (3 turns.)
MLB Effect: Increases critical star absorption by 400%. (3 turns.)
Refrain.Dialogue: Those who are troubled by the atonement, and those who embrace it.The road lined with cherry blossoms that someone once walked. The Gospel repeats itself, and once again we journey through a story that's ended.

Sprinter.Dialogue: Years ago, I admired the horses running in the meadow. If my worth was only to run, I wonder how simple and happy my life would be, and also, how cruel. He who keeps running, doesn't know that the end of the dream is not death, but the end of childhood.

Repeat Magic.Dialogue: A revolution in spell-casting!  These old farts are seriously stubborn.  Printing technology has ruined the Mystics, communications technology has poisoned the Mystics?  Copy, repeat, that's totally fine by me! Like these words being propagated by a vulgar crowd, spell-casting, too, one time should be enough!

Craft Essence EXP Card: Kuji Kanesada.Dialogue: "Those who would engage in combat are all in the battle formation before me." (Rin Pyou Tou Sha Kai Jin Retsu Zai Zen) An ancient sword with a 9-character inscription on the back. This historic weapon is a Mystic that rivals magecraft. "To kill a rabbit, one doesn't need a secret rendezvous. All you need is a single sword." Fan Translation: "Those who would engage in combat are all in the battle formation before me." (Rin Pyou Tou Sha Kai Jin Retsu Zai Zen) An ancient sword with a 9-character inscription on the back. This historical weapon is a Mystic that rivals magecraft. "To kill a rabbit, one doesn't need a secret rendezvous. All you need is a single sword."

Effect: Increases Buster, Arts and Quick performance by 10%.
MLB Effect: Increases Buster, Arts and Quick performance by 12%.
Kiss Your Hand.Dialogue: "Give me your hand, milady, and let us be on our way, to the one-night dance party." Three Heroic Gentlemen have descended upon Fuyuki, the decadent city that never sleeps. The party is about to start! Are your body and soul ready? Fan Translation: "Take my hand, ma'am. Let's go to the dance party for one night ─ ─ ─"Three heroic spirits that fell in Fuyuki, a decadent night city.The party starts soon...Preparation of the mind and body is good?

Teacher and I.Dialogue: "Let us begin the lesson. Did you bring your world map?" In a certain classroom in England, the boy who dreams of reaching the end of the world, his eyes are filled with interest as he listens to the man who has traveled the world. "Sir! Next...please tell me more about Japan." Fan Translation: "Let us begin the lesson. Did You bring your world map?" In a certain classroom in England, there is a boy who dreams of reaching the end of the world, his eyes are filled with interest as he listens to the man who has traveled the world. "Sir! Next...please tell me more about Japan."

Versus.Dialogue: "Whatever it takes, I will..." Arjuna and Karna are eternal rivals who are both student council presidents at a pair of sister schools. One day, a dark emotion manifests itself in the heart of honest Arjuna for the first time. ...And his heart gradually begins to change. How will the fight between these rivals end?

Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 12%.
MLB Effect: Increases critical star generation rate by 15%.
Four Beasts in the Moonlight.Dialogue: "In the name of the moon, we're gonna punish these villains! Damn we're golden!" Four shadows lightened by the full moon. This pack of four wolves wander from town to town, punishing villains in the name of the moon goddess. A fantastic tale of swordsmanship and heart-pumping action is about to begin! That aside, the bear is useless.

Glass Full Sweet Time.Dialogue: "Why don't you join us? What do you mean, why? Of course, it's for these lenses that brighten our feelings." Sweet glasses, cool glasses, and dangerous, sexy glasses. Which pair of glasses is your type?

Salon de Marie.Dialogue: " It's a strange thing. Our positions and beliefs are totally different, but we can sit here in one place and relax. A beauty whispers, and two men agree. The three, with completely different tastes and hobbies speak of a born idol, a woman who married the nation of France.

Prince of Slayer.Dialogue: " You are my Dragon. One wink, and you're mine★ The ultimate idol unit, Dragon Busters, has flown from Orleans and made their debut! No need to fear wyverns anymore! The Dragon Busters will protect you! ※ Ladies with Archer attributes may not enter the venue.

Noisy Obsession.Dialogue: "We're going to break everything! With our music that is!" Featuring Hyde (Vocal, Guitar), Arash (Bass), and Astolfo (Keyboard) in a three man band. They made their major debut in March 2018 during the event Chaldea Boys Collection. According to some media reports, after the release of their new single, "Stella", Arash was going to leave!? But ever since becoming the opening number at their debut concert, Arash has customarily vanished, only to rush back on stage for the 3rd song.

Last Encore.Dialogue: She looks up at the soaring ceiling.The applause fades, and the glory is gone, and many wishes have shattered into dust.…Is there light in that purgatory? Fan Translation: She stands staring up at the heavens far above. The applause fades to silence, The golden age turns to ashes, And thousands upon thousands of wishes are crushed and broken. ─────Will a light ever shine into such a purgatory?

\"Heaven's Feel\".Dialogue: I dream of peaceful days. A peace resting on the thinnest ice. A scale made from building blocks. A cradle balanced atop rubble. A cruel and gentle yesterday; one that may never come again once sleep takes me.  ..........Heaven's Feel Fan Translation: I dreamed of day-to-day warmth.Thin ice's calmness. Balance's building blocks. Above the rubble's origin.To be put to sleep, so as not to be visited again,That cruel and gentle yesterday. ─────Heaven's Feel

Effect: Increases party's (including sub members) Max HP by 1000. (Stackable)
MLB Effect: Increases party's (including sub members) Max HP by 1200. (Stackable)
Ideal Holy King.Dialogue: A Kings is not born in the human world,but is sent from Heaven.Kings born this way are said to possess the divine right to become the Holy King. A natural ruler, the pure, young king shines like the sun.That Holy King is the embodiment of an ideal. However, he does not yet know what must be offered up in the name of that ideal.

Effect: Increases own debuff success rate by 15%.
MLB Effect: Increases own debuff success rate by 20%.
Record Holder.Dialogue: One of the game champions from Asia speaks. "The real way to win is to train and hone your skills." The genius gamer spends his days training, hoping one day he may defeat the grand champion, who reigns over the game world with sheer playtime.

Beast of Billows.Dialogue: The dignity of a sea god, a howl that summons tornadoes.   Its name is Curruid.   A great beast who lies in distant seas.   The legendary spear, "Gae Bolg," was carved from the skull of this monster.

Personal Training.Dialogue: The training simulator. You tried to tag along with Mash's training program, but it turned out to be harder than you thought.  "Good work, Master." Her smile and trust shine brighter than any light.  No, it doesn't matter how hard the training is, it's all worth it for this very moment!

School of Chaldea.Dialogue: Although they live in different eras, that won't stop their search for knowledge. The debate between the two great brains of Chladea, shall continue to live on even today. "Medical, observation, event restoration, even equipment maintenance... You've been really busy lately, Romani. You're working ten times harder than everybody else to make up for all that slacking you did, huh?" "Honestly, taking it easy is supposed to be my motto. But I just gave to endure it a bit more. It seems like our new Master is far more talented than me." Fan Translation: Even if the times they lived may differ, the search for knowledge shall never change. The exchange of the two greatest minds of Chaldea Continues on another day. "Medical treatment, observation, repairing phenomenon, and maintenance. You've been working real hard these days, Romani. For all the times you've slacked off, aren't you working ten times harder than the average man?" "Seriously, taking it easy is supposed to be my motto. But, well, I just have to endure it a bit more. It seems that new master is much more talented than me, after all."

Holy Maiden Leading Chaldea.Dialogue: They say the flag wielded by the Maiden of Orleans is the symbol of hope and inspiration for many to follow. Well, that aside, she walks the path of flames leading heroes to victory. Believe in the glorious My Room that awaits at the end of the path! Fan Translation: It has been said the banner the Maiden of Orleans waves Is the symbol of hope for many. Well, putting all that aside, Guiding these men with their eyes on victory, the holy maiden conquers the path of flames. Believing the glory of your room lies beyond it!

Effect: When defeated, charge party's NP gauge by 15%.
MLB Effect: When defeated, charge party's NP gauge by 20%.
Empieta.Dialogue: Selfless love is noble, and heartfelt devotion is beautiful. Seeking ideals is undoubtedly a virtue. But the Dragon Witch shall always remember, at the end of glory, a knight was hurt, defeated, and at the end, fell to darkness. Fan Translation: The free love is precious, the devotion from the heart is beautiful. It is certainly virtue to pursue the ideal. However, on the back of the brillianity, it got scratched,As a result, there was the existence of a fallen knight,The witch of the dragon is unforgettable.

Art of the Poisonous Snake.Dialogue: After a long path of training, he mastered the fist. However, because of his lack of will due to his training, he can never be more than a vague assassin.  Until one rainy night, he ran into a certain witch.

Art of Death.Dialogue: The human body is so vivid and beautiful. The limbs its canvas. The blood its paint. He believes whole-heartedly that he's a true artist, with blades as the brushes for his work.

Gentle Affection.Dialogue: Happiness.   Not all happiness can be found under the sun.  Just like a certain girl was to her at the end of the reincarnation, at the bottom of the abyss, and at where hellfire blazed. You can also find happiness

Volumen Hydrargyrum.Dialogue: In the hands of a skilled wielder, Volumen Hydrargyrum's silver stream can turn into swords, its waves into shields, and even its splashes can become deadly. This is the supreme Mystic Code of the Archibald family,the depths of which an ordinary mage could never pierce.   All you lowly creatures who called yourself mages, you will know that your toys are of no match before true arts.

Effect: Charges NP gauge by 4% every turn.
MLB Effect: Charges NP gauge by 5% every turn.
Young Maiden Ignorant of Love.Dialogue: The path to reaching the Root seems long and endless. That's why mages concentrate on prolonging their bloodlines, so that one day their children might achieve their eternal wish. There is no place for individuals. As it is her heritage and destiny, she has no choice but to follow her family's wish. ...However, she is not yet aware of the existence of emotions that could overwrite all wishes and destiny.

Self Geass Scroll.Dialogue: This is a set of laws that are unbreakable by mages, a type of spell that is so powerful it even binds the soul. When the contract is signed... No one can break it, nor escape from it. ...Only for the ones who signed it, that is.

Effect: Increases Buster, Arts and Quick performances by 8%.
MLB Effect: Increases Buster, Arts and Quick performances by 10%.
Before Awakening.Dialogue: My heart trembles at vice more than virtue, and at corruption more than honesty. My soul is being shredded by my sins. Even if I am a servant of God, there's no salvation for me. During the Fourth Holy Grail War in Fuyuki, the man searches for his answer within numerous battles. Fan Translation: At vice more than virtue, And at corruption more than purity, Is this heart of mine stricken. My very soul contorts at the depth of my sin. Though it may lodge within the house of God, this body shall know no salvation. The fourth Holy Grail War was held in Fuyuki.And in the heart of that raging maelstrom, he continued to seek his answer.

His Rightful Place.Dialogue: Once a great king went on an expedition to the farthest lands. Raise the flags, so his name shall be known throughout the world. Praise his name, so his authority shall leave a mark on this world. And that's why we shall continue to march forward. The expedition will not end. Glory lies beyond the horizon. It's worth the challenge because it's unreachable. Until the eventual end of time. Praise and show to the world the path of conquest. All to be with our great king.

Craft Essence EXP Card: Burrowing Worms.Dialogue: Many creatures are often chosen as familiars, but not many mages would choose insects, especially those insects that are not of this world. This insect is the informant to hell itself. As a parasite, the host will gain various abilities, but ultimately, this insect's true nature is to devour, multiply, and destroy. There's nothing that awaits the host except terrifying demise. Fan Translation: Many creatures are often chosen as familiars, but not many mages would choose insects, especially those insects that are not of this world. This insect is the informant of hell itself. As a parasite, the host will gain various abilities, but ultimately, this insect's true nature is to devour, multiply, and destroy. There's nothing that awaits the host except terrifying demise.

Effect: Increases party's attack by 15% while she is on the field.
Crown of the Stars.Dialogue: The legend speaks. Kings are noble, holy, and unreachable. As a promising and fulfilling tomorrow awaits. The star speaks. Eras will change, rules will change. The age of kingship will one day come to an end. The crown shines brightly atop accepting the truth. Even one shall never be rewarded, and even if the ideal shall never be realized. Fan Translation: Legend states. That there would be a divine king and that that person would be an important existence. That there would be contentment in the end, in the existence of a tomorrow. That is what the stars said. Even so, eras pass, life goes on. The king’s reign was eventually brought to ruin, too. That crown shone on the head of one who was aware of that. They were not rewarded. The place they aimed for was no more than a far off ideal. [1]

Effect: Increases party's Buster performance by 15% while he is on the field.
Relic of The King.Dialogue: Inexperienced, unskilled, and ordinary. There was a time where the boy only knew uncertainty. But there was a king who scolded him, who laughed with him. With loneliness, regret, and a little sense of pride, the boy continues to chase after his king. Fan Translation: Inexperienced, unaccomplished, ordinary. In the boy’s youth, he was simply put - lost. He scolded him, but the king tried to laugh together with him too. Effect: Increases party's debuff resistance by 30% while he is on the field.
To My Darling.Dialogue: Let me tell you a story. Ever since his own birth, the man has always been unsatisfied. Pain, itchiness, dullness, swelling. His body was filled with these feelings all over like a lice infection. He believed in words instead of intuitions, and stories over emotions. Therefore, the man was not at peace with himself. It doesn't matter if it's the grievance of the oppressed, or if it's the joy of the unworthy neighbors. Everything seems to be full of unbearable discontentment. The man said, "I'm like a cat swarmed by lice." All of my worries, you laughed them off as if they were simply something insignificant. This was what happened on one sunny, yet very ordinary day. Fan Translation: I will attempt to tell this modest story. All his life, a manhas always been dissatisfied.Pain. Itchiness. Dullness. Swelling.Such feelings cover the body like lice.He believed in language rather than instinct, stories rather than emotion.However, the entirety of the world could not fit into the man’s skin.In the face of the laments of the lower class,And the joy of his fellows, who were unworthy of love, He could only feel intolerable frustration.The man said.“I am like a cat that fleas leech off of.”All of those accumulated, trivial worries,and you laughed brightly. Only the gentle sunlight was of worthy note,and nothing else, on that spring day.

But. The key of that storehouse can only be handled by its king.The mould of the key is constantly changing,And its inventory of treasure increases even now.The moment his ability to understand that wisdom is lost,The key to the treasury will not open.

Door of Babylon.Dialogue: The vault that holds all treasures on earth. Also called the "Gate of the Gods." The legendary treasure vault of Babylon itself. At the grave of Assyrian Queen Nitocris, it is said there hides the door leading to such a vault. Although the many Kings of Babylon would never touch it, a great king opened the door without hesitation. Herodotus wrote, "There was nothing in the grave." Didn't the king obtain a vast amount of wealth? Or did the king bring prosperity upon his nation through politics alone? At least the king's descendants were wealthy. Therefore, many battles were waged upon such a notion. Fan Translation: It collected all the treasures in the world. In other words, it was the “Divine Gate.” That was the Babylonian treasure spoken of in legend. The tombstone of the Assyrian Queen Nitocris Keeps the “door” to the treasury hidden. Successive Babylonian kings made no mention of this, But a great king was to magnificently open the “door.” Herodotus wrote “Nothing is on that grave,” But hadn’t a king gained immense wealth from that door? Is it only by good government that a king could enrich a country? At the very least, the king’s descendant’s should be endowed with wealth. Then I will obtain it by fighting them over and over—

The Golden Apple.Dialogue: The forbidden fruit of the Gods, causing men's rationality to fade, yet promises them immortality. Any human being would stop, reach for the fruit, and try to eat it. This is a conditioned response, similar to how you will retract your hand when touching something hot, a response carved deeply into our body. A long time ago, during a race, someone used this on me and I had stopped, losing control over myself. I really don't want to remember what happened after. And that's precisely why I won't give this to you. ...because, you have no need of something like this. Isn't that right? Fan Translation: ――It is the Fruit of the Gods. It is the Forbidden Fruit that promises Immortality and melts Human reason with it's taste. If this is used, any Human would stop in their tracks. They would want to get their hands on and eat it. It is a conditioned reflex, much like when touching something hot and dropping it by reflex. The body cannot resist the urge. Once, this was used on me and I stopped. You don't need this type of thing after all. Right?

Rotary Matchlock.Dialogue: The Demon King who obliterated the strongest cavalry brigade in the Warring States period. Her battle has changed so many concepts of "War," and brought revolution to the battlefield. It takes time to reload, and the accuracy is questionable. Guns will never be of value on the battlefield. That was what everybody thought at the time. "Then I just need to gather a whole bunch of them and fire away right? ...In waves." And today, the Demon King has obtained another innovation. By the way, although the name is confusing, it's a matchlock rifle modified by adding rifling to the barrel, and not a Gatling gun. "What? There's something like that? I-I want it!" Fan Translation: The Demon King who destroyed the strongest cavalry corps in the Sengoku Era. That one battle single-handedly revolutionised the very notion of warfare. With their unreliable aim, and need for time-consuming reloading, firearms are simply not suited to the battlefield - such was the common consensus. "But if that's the case, why can't we just line up as many as we can and fire away? You know, in turns?" ――And now, the Demon King has revolutionised the firearm once again. Incidentally, the name "rotary matchlock" is misleading; it is a matchlock equipped with a rifled barrel, rather than a gatling gun. "What's that? A gatling gun? I-I want one of those too!"

Effect: Increases party's critical star generation rate by 20% while she is on the field.
Llamrei Unit II.Dialogue: What a wonderful sled... What a beautiful horse... That is what Santa thinks to herself the day after Christmas while being covered by the vibrant glow of sunrise. "I can't wait for next year... 363 days of the year gone to waste... Humans are such sad creatures." But she doesn't yet know, that tragedy is already drawing close. Yes... Who said there was only one Santa? Fan Translation: What a wonderful sleigh... And what a beautiful horse...On the day after Christmas has ended, in the dawning morning glow, Santa thinks. "Will next year not come quicker... For 363 days out of an entire year to be meaningless, humans are such sad creatures..." But she did not know.The true tragedy that was imminent. ---Yes. Who said that there was only one Santa?

Effect: Increases Party's Buster Card performance by 15% while he's on the field.
Things to Calm the Heart.Dialogue: Don't lose your heart. Don't forget to care, protect, and love. People would easily fall into sinful pleasures. Do not hurt, mock, or degrade others. Because that is only a manifestation of weakness. Everyday, I stand in front of the mirror and caution myself. Be righteous. Even if the world is filled with so many evils. Fan Translation: Do not lose heart.Do not forget to be merciful, to champion others, and to love.Man falls all too easily to the pleasure of treachery. Deny your self that hurts, mocks and degrades others. Because that is only a manifestation of weakness.Everyday, I stand in front of the mirror and caution myself.Be righteous.Even if the world should be filled with so many evils.

Effect: Increases party's Buster performance by 15% while he's on the field.
The Glory of the Past.Dialogue: Let's shoot, steal, eat, assault, and kill! Have fun and live, have fun and die. As we're drowned in joy, pleasure and happiness, as we're screaming, begging for more, aye, let's struggle and die! There's no need to mourn the dead and repent for our sins. We're pirates, and we're destined for Davy Jones' Locker. So what's there to worry? Ahoy, let's set sail with our beloved ship, and get killed with a smile on our faces! Fan Translation: Shoot, steal, devour, commit crimes, and kill. Live and die enjoyably. And then, while you immerse yourself in happiness, joy, and pleasure, scream that even so, you still need more, more. And as you scream, struggle violently and die. There wasn't any need to mourn the dead. Repenting for murder was just as pointless. I mean, we were pirates. The fact we were gonna go to hell was decided the moment we were born. Okay, let's see if you can give me and my lovely ship a happy death!

Effect: Increase Party's Quick Card performance by 15% while he's on the field.
Heaven Among the Mountains.Dialogue: Cut ties to the ordinary world, praise desire as one living, aim for infinity as a swordsman. I have long forgot my own age, and I have long lost my own image. Training is my ordinary. Tirelessly, continuously, endlessly. Before my end, I walked out into the woods and took a breath. ...His blade has finally reached the hollow moon. Training is my ordinary. Tirelessly, continuously, endlessly. Before my end, I walked out into the woods and took a breath. ...His blade has finally reached the hollow moon.

Divine Princess of The Storm.Dialogue: The wind created by her fan can snuff out flame, call forth clouds, and cause the rain, bringing nature's blessing upon this earth. However, if she wishes, she can also turn blessing into disaster. Please do not forget that.

MLB Effect: When enters the field, increases party Buster performance by 15%. (3 turns.)
Ox-Demon King.Dialogue: A king of demons as powerful as the great Monkey King. Once the greatest amongst all immortals in the heavens. Now, she's a great and powerful demon. Her height exceeds the clouds and she can hurdle a hundred mountains with one leap. Her True Name is the Ox-Demon King. Yes, she is one raging bovine. Especially in, ah, profile. Fan Translation: As well a Beautiful King and is called the Devil, He once bowed to the heavenly world, and he was the chief of Shichun Daisho. If you express yourself, your strength will penetrate the clouds, and a great demon over the hundred mountains by one spring.The real name is called the nine-headed ox-king.Yes. It is a ferocious ox without confusion. Here. Especially. Somewhere.
