A Tale of Love and Hope.Dialogue: History is a fabric woven by humanity over the ages. Love is its thread, while hope is the hand that weaves it towards a dazzling future. Now come on. You should go on a journey that will spin history too. Fan Translation: History is a weaving produced by the period and the people. Love become the yarn, hope become the weaver, continuing on to the sparkling future. --- Now then, you too, let's go on a trip to weave history.

Greatest Journey.Dialogue: The burning sun. The scent of burning asphalt. With tools in hand, the struggle continues. The journey has just begun. Fan Translation: The shining sun. The smell of asphalt. With tools in hand, the strenuous work continues. The journey has only just begun!

TEAM Phoenix.Dialogue: "The wonderful recipes from the cafeteria in my beloved new Chaldea were stolen, and we observed that a certain diner has been brazenly serving those very dishes. Since we had some time on our hands, we declared this incident a Micro-Singularity, and a new Rayshift technique fittingly appropriate for my new Chaldea has been boldly executed!" Excerpt from: Chapter 13 of the Musik Accounts/The Phoenix Flaps 13 Times "Heh heh heh. Riding a two-wheeler isn't so bad sometimes. Though I prefer racing machines. By the way, where's this diner you speak of, Mister Piccata? Fou is starting to get a bit ornery here!" "I keep telling you, my name is Meunière! (But that's strange. We've been riding for two days straight...and the diner we're looking for is called Restaurant to Another World: ChiefRed...?) ...Um, sir? Would you believe it if I told you we're not on Earth?" "Eh? ...Haha, such nonsense. But now that you mention it, our communication issue still hasn't been resolved, I think I saw something that looked like a tyrannosaurus, and I can only assume that this place has two suns... Must be my imagination. Don't you agree, Mister Fish and Chips!?" Fan Translation: "A diner that stole gorgeous recipes from my beloved reborn Chaldea's dining hall then brazenly utilized them was observed. Having some free time on our hands, we used it as a Pseudo-Singularity and boldly carried out a new Rayshift at the reborn Chaldea Base...!" Excerpt from Musik War Record Chapter 13/Phoenix's 13th wing spread "Fufufu. Occasionally using two-wheel vehicle isn't so bad. But well, my favourite is actually the racer-type machine.  By the way, we still haven't reached the rumored diner, Piccata-kun?  [1] Even Fou-kun is getting into a bad mood, you know!" "I already told you, my name is Meuniere!  (But it is certainly strange. We've already travelled for two days... I mean, even the name of that restaurant is Parallel Universe Dining Hall Chief Red...)...  Hey, old man. Would you believe me if I told you we are not on Earth?" "Eh? ......HaHAha, wHaT kInD oF nOnSeNsE aRe YoU tAlKiNg AbOuT?  Speaking of which, not only the communication hasn't been fully restored, but a short while a go I also saw something that looks like a Tyrannosaurus at a distant, actually I could see two suns but, that's just my imagination, isn't it, Fish-and-Chips-kun!?"

Effect: Increases Mystic Code EXP gained by 1%.
(When using a Friend Support with this CE: 3%)
MLB Effect: Increases Mystic Code EXP gained by 5%.
(When using a Friend Support with this CE: 15%)
Be Graceful.Dialogue: Noblesse oblige. It is the responsibility of a gentleman to be generous. The photo is just an image. "This photo doesn't do me justice. I'm actually more svelte, and Toole IV isn't as modest in real life as seen in that photo. Hm? What kind of maid is Toole IV, you ask? Ah. You'll have to excuse me for my lack of description, but you do know of Miss Nightingale, yes? Toole's...not unlike her." Fan Translation: Noblesse Oblige. To act with elegance is a privilege of the gentry. The portrait is a self-styled image. "But the level of photography is lacking. I'm a bit more slim than that and I don't care for Toole Type IV like those. Hm? What is a Toole Type IV maid, you say? Hmph. You should feel grateful that this is probably too difficult of an example to understand, but it's like having an unmarried woman like Nightingale around. It feels about the same."

Effect: Increases party's Quick performance by 10% and critical damage by 15% while she is on the field.
The Love the Gods Bequeathed.Dialogue: You want to know about this crown? Well, you see... The old Norse gods left it to me, you know, before they were destroyed by the flaming sword. This happened long before our Scandinavian world met with destruction. From the Nine Worlds that formed the Norse... A single drop of brilliance was collected from each of the realms' most precious objects. With all nine of these, the gods wove a crown for their bride. Surprisingly, this crown doesn't possess any magical energy at all. It's just an ordinary crown... But isn't it beautiful? I think so too, yes. Fan Translation: This crown, you say? Aaah... that is.... It was an entity that was bequeathed to me by the Nordic Gods in the past. Before they were blasted and burned by the  Flaming Sword This was before my Nordic Realm is brought to ruin. Scandinavia​ was formed by nine domains--- And each domain sends out their most beautiful one, One glittering drop at a time. By assembling the nine parts, The gods begin to knit the Bride's Crown. It is capable of a holding surprising amount of mana, Even though it was just a crown. Isn't it beautiful? I think so too.

Fate/Grand Order Arcade (CE).Illustrator: Takeuchi Takashi & Simosi & Azusa & pako & B-suke & Honjou Raita & Morii Shizuki & Rin Kususaga
Fate/Grand Order Arcade (CE).Dialogue: The battling stage comes to the Arcade... Playing the Servants in a new Holy Grail War. In this place, there is no Chaldea. There are more than one last Master of Humanity, The same goes for Justice and opinion.

MLB Effect: Increases Mystic Code EXP gained by 50.
Singularity F.Dialogue: The burning city. The long journey to look for the Holy Grail, Grand Order. Everything starts here. Oh Celtic mage, the transient Druid. I pray that you wholeheartedly guide our Master...

Emerald Float.Dialogue: Would you like to enjoy some nice and cool chilled pancake while being gently swayed by the emerald sea?  The stars at the bottom of the sea, the sound of ripples. The gentle breeze through our hair, the sun's fingertip burn our nape. Maybe such a fine dream of summer days would be possible Some day, some where, with you-

Hero on the Beach.Dialogue: When the waves blot out the sun's ray, he extends his hands. The wind tickles your cheek; its salty scent fills your lungs. As soon as you take his hand, the ocean will be right before you. Fan Translation: With the brilliance of the sun reflected on the waves, he suddenly held out his hand. The smell of salt and winds that caress the cheeks. If I take that hand, the sea is right there.

Storms and Waves.Dialogue: A refreshing breeze flows into the midsummer's sea. The surge, the raging wave, none of that matters. I don't know how to stop this vigour.Having the presence of mind that integrates with nature, such is the proof of master swordsmen.

Effect: Increases Arts and Quick performance by 8%.
MLB Effect: Increases Arts and Quick performance by 10%.
Sunset Jam.Dialogue: The ivories are tickled, the brass reverberates, and the beats pound to the rhythm. All this combines into a single melody, and it echoes into the crimson sky. Fan Translation: A bursting keyboard and a resounding brass,  an impulse played together to the beat. The overlapping timbre become a rich melody that reverberates to the crimson sky.

All Night Fever.Dialogue: Music that reverberates through the body's core and the flashing lights paint the place with their dazzling glow. The girls who dance before your eyes are like flowers blooming wildly in the summer. This ServantFes night has just begun. Fan Translation: The sound resonating through our body's core and the brilliant light dye the venue vividly. The girls dancing in front of our eyes are like full-bloom flowers in the summer. The night of the Servant Summer Festival has only just begun-

Writing High.Dialogue: "A new issue? I don't believe it, but looks like we managed to make it in time! I don't know how many we made, but go ahead and take whatever catches your eye! Price? We can't possibly put a price on them. Why don't you use that head of yours and a bit of common sense as a reader to decide!? But that aside, we'll charge at least 100BB Bucks to cover the printing cost." A money jar sits on the table next to the anguished writer of children's stories and the dozing playwright. It appears that it's been left to your discretion and courage to determine the price you'll pay. Hold on a minute, is every book on this table different!? "Hm? Aren't we going to change into swimsuit, you ask? Idiot, if I go into the ocean, I'm sure to get dragged underwater by a mermaid!" Fan Translation: "A new book? I can't believe this but it looks like you got here just in time for one! You have no idea how many books I've written, huh, take these conspicuously adequate things away! Price? Can we even put a price on such a thing of this nature? Listen to your sense as an avid reader, you bastard! Well, that said, just for printing cost however, I would take at least 100BB$." There was an abandoned money box on the table of the children story's writer who is laughing in utter desperation and the playwright who is dozing off with an achieved face.  It seems the price is depending on your nerve.  Putting that aside, could it be that these authors are currently writing different books one by one......? "Hn? You are asking why I'm not changing into swimwear? You idiot, if I go into the sea or something, isn't it obvious that I would ended up being pulled in by a mermaid!?"

Painting Summer.Dialogue: Whether during summer or at the beach, the obsessive painter's brush is never still. There is always a moment to capture in painting. But if you call out her name... See? She'll turn around and smile at you, and then get right back to making that brush dance! Fan Translation: Whether it is summer or the beach, Mad About Art's brush would not stop. There is something that can only be drawn right here right now. But if you call her name, look, she would turn around and smile... And then go back to twirling her paintbrush again. As expected!

Effect: Charges NP gauge by 4% every turn.
MLB Effect: Charges NP gauge by 5% every turn.
Lady Foxy.Dialogue: The wind whispers over the water's surface at twilight. A bat's wing flutters. A pointed triangle...golden... You see a summer mirage, as if bewitched. Fan Translation: The wind carries across the water's surface in the twilight.  The instant the bat's skin fluttered off, you surely witnessed it. Triangular, pointed... golden... a bewitching summer mirage.

Water Shine.Dialogue: On a sunny summer day, having a chat by the pool side can be fun. And it's even better with a good cocktail. That's right...so that one can escape reality just for a bit. Fan Translation: It's also very enjoyable to talk by the poolside in a clear summer day. Having some delicious sake nearby would be even better. That's right, so that we can get high away from this world even for just a little while.

Melancholy of the Theatrical Demon.Dialogue: There's no sense debating how well it turned out. The point is, everyone brainstormed, agonized over it, and put all their efforts in to making this doujin for their club, Gespenst Ketzer. It's a story about a demon who possesses immeasurable power and a girl, but the plotting is slow and kind of confusing. Readers were also able to detect the writer's embarrassment through some of the characters' lines. And even the action scenes that should've been included are omitted, possibly due to lack of time. That may have been so, but none of it really matters. The work itself fairly exudes an aura of pride and joy. It's a very natural response anyone might have after creating their own story. It all began here. Fan Translation: No need to argue whether the result is good or bad. Everyone thinking, agonizing, twisting then creating ... The doujinshi of Gespent Ketzer. Overall, its a story of a devil who have great power and a girl. The story is stretching, going left and right. You can feel the author is shivering just by looking at the lines. There should be a good action scene, but there is not enough time so it has been omitted. However, such things doesn't matter. There is aura of pleasure on this work. To spin a story is a primitive delight to everyone. The beginning of everything, is starting from here.

Little little bullet.Dialogue: A heartwarming military story. Innocent girls make use of many different kinds of weapons to complete their missions. Their enemy: a mechanical silicone creature that arrived from space and kicks off many a battle in the streets. However, the enemy never makes an appearance in this doujin. All that is depicted here is the cute little scenes of the girls picking out their weapons.  Drawing their guns and other weapons took too long, so the actual story was left unfinished. Fan Translation: Heartfelt Military. The innocent little girls Master a great variety of weapons and go on missions. Taking the role of the villain is The Mechanical Silicon Orgasm That come from space and instigating urban warfare. However, in this doujinshi, the villain doesn't make an appearance. The only thing being drawn is  The adorable figures of the girls choosing their own weapons. Since drawing small firearms took too much time, The crucial part of the manga ended up being unfinished.

Our Round Table.Dialogue: A heartfelt, poetic, and intellectual comedy. It's a story of an eleven-sibling family called the Round Table. By chance, this big family adopts the Little Lion King. This small-town adventure manga centers on the Little Lion King, who already carries herself like royalty, while the Round Table brothers don't really do much other than standing around being handsome. Though small in scale, plenty of world-altering events occur in the story. Most of them are Merlin's fault. Fan Translation: A heartfelt and poetic comedy for people with refined taste. It is a story about the Little Lion King, who was adopted as a son in an unexpected turn of events, and the large family of 11 siblings, the Round Table family.  A manga about the neighbourhood adventures centered around the Little Lion King who is young but already displays the characteristics of the former King, the Round Table's brothers whose faces are at least good-looking don't play any particular roles in it. The occurrences of small but world-shocking incidents are usually Merlin's fault.

Curry x Rice.Dialogue: A fantasy story of ancient India blazing in the tropical sunshine. This epic seems unable to be contained within the pages of a doujin, where the incredible spectacle is sure to keep you at the edge of your seats. The tale focuses on two warriors whose fate made them walk different paths, but are eventually revealed to be related to each other. Heretofore unheard-of production methods stemming from tan avant-garde thought process and bizarre gimmicks create a feat for the reader's eyes. The only thing those who read this work can find it in themselves to say is "Holy moly, India's amazing!" Plus, the production values of the song-and-dance declaration of love are incredible. But since this is just a fantasy story, it's important to keep in mind that it isn't at all historically accurate. Fan Translation: An ancient Indian fantasy, rumbling through the sunshine of the southern islands! An epic of amazing proportions, one that cannot be contained on a mere doujinshi's pages! Never before seen, creative battle strategies, numerous wonderful gimmicks to entertain the readers, overwhelming visual impact that would leave readers exclaiming "India is great!", "Amazing India!" Conveying love through a dance scene is also pure perfection! Since this is a work of fantasy, please do not expect historical accuracy.

Built Upper Martha.Dialogue: The fact that we've been summoned as Servants means that we all strive to become the strongest! At the tropical beach, a bare-knuckle fighting tournament is set to begin! Though Martha had no intention of participating, she had no choice but to do so in order to reclaim her stolen Holy Knuckles.  "Bring it on! I'll have every single one of you repent!"  Ushiwaka the jumping swallow, the Mutou-dori Yagyu, and king fist Beowulf...  After defeating many powerful opponents, her final adversary, Sasaki Kojirou of Ganryu, appears before her! "Gentleness is key to counter torrents, I see." With all her moves blocked or countered, Martha was cornered. Then, as her last-ditch effort, she unleashes a secret move that she developed during her youth that she swore never to use...!  Unfortunately, that was all they had time to do, so the book simply ends there... Fan Translation: As long as they were summoned, there isn't a Servant who wouldn't strive to be the strongest! In a tropical beach, a fist-fight tournament begins...! Martha never planned to enter,  but to take back her stolen Holy Knuckles,  she is unwillingly forced to join the battle.  "Bring it on! I'll make you all repent one by one!"  Ushiwaka of the Flying Swallow, Yagyu of the Bladeless State, Beowulf of the Royal Fist,  after exchanging blows with a variety of rivals (comrades), she must face Ganryu Sasaki Kojiro...! "In dealing with heavy currents, one must retaliate gently." Having punch after punch being evaded, the cornered Martha must unleash her hidden fist developed during her town-girl days that she had sworn to never use again...!  And unfortunately, they ran out of pages at this point.

Giant Babbage.Dialogue: A dark and sensitive tale... Well, that was the idea at first, but it ended up turning into a mecha story. The mech design and various settings are surprisingly intricate. In fact, the main unit, Giant Babbage, has twelve different secret techniques, and the rival Giant Elisa unit was secretly constructed with multi-staged structures for land and air operation, are sure to grab at the readers' heartstrings. But sadly, this doujin is incomplete. The words "Giant Babbage's battle is about to begin" are boldly written on the final pages. Fan Translation: A dark and sensitive romance fiction... Was what it was supposed to be. However, the complete work was a serious Robot romance fiction. The mechanical design and the settings are the best parts. With the leading machine Giant Babbage equipped with twenty varieties of killer techniques, and multistage transform mechanism to take control of the land, sea, and air hidden by the rival Giant Eliza, it is sure to gripe at the heart of the readers, isn't it? But it is kind of sad that it is not completed as a manga doujinshi. "The battle of Giant Babbage is now beginning"  Is written in bold on the last page.

Mothers' Ears.Dialogue: A slice of life, animal-fantasy manga. In this story, anthropomorphized animals live in the fantasy setting of Chaldea Land. A rabbit mommy and a fox mommy. A bear daddy, and a cat daughter. They make one happy family and spend their heartwarming days together. It sounds a bit like a nursery tale. A travelling platypus named Merlin, and a hunter racoon named Arash also make an appearance. As a side note, the daughter Jack is actually a human who reincarnated from a different world. The moment she arrived in Chaldea Land, she turned into a girl of the cat clan. Fan Translation: A fantasy manga about the everyday's life of the beastkins. A gentle tale is written about Chaldealand, where anthropomorphic animals live. A close-knitted family of two Rabbit-kin and Fox-kin mothers, a Bear-kin dad, and the beloved Cat-kind daughter, spending warm days together.  There is also a sense of fairy tale about the story. The neighbours Platypus-kin Merlin, and the Raccoon-kin Arash also make an appearance. In addition, the beloved daughter Little Jack is actually a human who came from a parallel world. It seems that moment she arrived at Chaldealand, she turned into a Cat-kin girl.

We Can't Summon!.Dialogue: A cool, hip romantic comedy of school life. It is a story of an ordinary main character who deepens his bond with various heroines. The first heroine is able to communicate with spirits, and knew the main character long before the main character knew her. When they are reunited a few years later, it appears he forgot the important promise made with the heroine. "Hnngh. It feels like I'd be a loser if I reminded him of my promise...so I'll make the spirits jog his memory!" Oh, also, within two days of their reunion, there was a whole scare about the main character having to suddenly move away. The second heroine is a senpai-next-door sort of heroine who had always taken good care of the main character. She could be both stern and sweet. The way she embraces the main character us more akin to how a big sister or mother might do so. But, be warned that she can be more frightening than an oni when angered. "Oh my, look how dirty you are. Would you like me to give you a bath while I rubby-rub you all clean like we did back in the day?" The third heroine is...well, she's a stalker who fell in love with the main character at first sight after he came into her home to shelter from the rain. Their firsts words were exchanged when the main character peeked under his bed in the middle of the night, sensing something strange. "I love you! Kya! I said it! When should we sign our marriage certificate?" At their school, there's an urban legend that says that anyone who summons the goddess of love under the legendary tree will find the love they desire. But obviously, the heroines vying for the affection of the main character surely will not let their rivals get ahead. And so, the goddess who flirts with the bear remains up in the heavens, while the great war for love rages down on the surface... Fan Translation: A pop and cute school love comedy. An ordinary protagonist getting to deepen bonds with various heroines. One is a someone, who before gaining self-awareness, has actually met the protagonist, a heroine with the ability to sense the unnatural. When they reunited after ten odd years, he has somehow forgotten about the important promise they exchanged with each other.  "Hmm. I feel like I already lost saying this... Even if I have to call on the spirits, I'm gonna make you remember!". Yet, when they met again two days later, she was in the risk of moving house again. One is someone who has meddled into his life since long ago, the Senpai next door heroine. Sometimes she is strict, sometimes she is sweet, that tolerance is more than his sister and his mother. However, when she loses her temper, she is scary like a demon.  "My my, you got all covered in mud. Let's take a bath together like old time and   Tenmoukaikai ." One is someone who took shelter from the rain in front of his house and fell in love with him at first sight, a heroine with stalker tendency. The first time they talked was that day's nighttime, when the protagonist felt uncomfortable and looked under his own bed.  "...I like you! Kyaa, I've said it! When do we go to register our marriage?" There is a legend in this school that "If you summon the Goddess of Love under this tree of legend, she would make any kind of love come true", however, no one would allow their rivals in love to make a head start. Thus, the Goddess who flirts with a bear remains in the Heavens, and the Love Civil War carried on today as well.

Miss Anastasia Who Loves Ramen.Dialogue: A revolution exploded within the icy kingdom, and so the entire royal family fled to Japan, a nation on the precipice of an unprecedented age of ramen. The former duchess and current part-time worker Anastasia Nibutamenma Hosomenva toils without end to fund her cross-Japan ramen journey alongside Rock Boy, a boy she met and befriended in a chance encounter, who one day dreams of opening his own ramen shop. "I live for this single bowl of ramen!" The next issue promises a ramen battle between ramen champion Houzouin and Rock boy. Fan Translation: A revolution broke out at a country that is nothing but cold and freezing. For that reason, the whole family vamoosed together To Japan, which seems to be welcoming an era of unprecedented large ramen. The former Imperial Princess, now part-timer Anastasia Nibutamenma Hosomenba, who was dripping with sweat while working, went on a ramen pilgrimage all over Japan with a punk rock boy she met by chance at a ramen shop. "I live for this full bowl...!" Also, in the next volume, a ramen battle between the Champion of the Ramen World, Houzouin, and the punk rock boy unfolds.

I Want to Rip the Wicked & Villainous Da.Dialogue: "Could I possibly be inside a game!?" After "I" awoke from being knocked out by a plancha move from the top rope, the world if a popular otome game called "Secret Jewel Magic" opened up before "my" eyes! "I" reincarnated into the daughter of Count Edelfelt, destined to be defeated by the main character, Ishtarin (a commoner who's only versed in Bajiquan). Using my proud wrestling moves, a red-haired butler who serves the komtesse, a pale knight of few words, a bard who would sleep at any opportunity, and a knight in shining armor-type proto prince who is also the fiancé to the komtesse... All these weird conquests need to be taken down! "If this is a game where I can't win, then I'll just make sure she doesn't win either!" Coming to the ultimate realization that "I" just needed to knock out all the pretty boys before Ishtarin conquers them, "I" vanquish the game's world in no time at all. However, "I" never realize that such actions would lead me to become the villainess of the entire world... As the battle between the two heroines escalates without any end in sight, what will the conclusion reveal...? Fan Translation: "Don't tell me... this is inside of a game...!?" After getting plancha from the top rope, "I" lost consciousness and when I woke up, "I" ended up in this world of the masterpiece Otome game "Secret Jewel Magic"! "I", who reincarnated as the Count's daughter, Edelfelt, had to suffer the fate of getting defeated by the protagonist Ishtarin (whose only saving grace is her Baijiquan).  Using the proud professional wrestling attack, I'm going to knock all the idiosyncratic capture targets like the red haired butler serving the daughter, the pewter knight who lacks words, the minstrel who falls asleep if you don't keep tab on him, the Prince-on-a-white-horse proto-type King who is the fiancee of the Count's daughter dead down...! "If it is a game where I cannot win, then I won't let her win either!" The "I" who realized the ultimate truth that it is better if "I" knocked out all the good-looking men before Ishtarin captures them, in the blink of an eye, has taken the game world. Without realizing that they themselves have turned into the enemies of the world, what will become of the never-ending escalating battle between the two heroines.

Bible of Shingon Tachikawa School.Dialogue: A normal, wholesome, Buddhist slow-life essay. ...At least that's what it's supposed to be, but as you read on, strange symptoms begin to manifest, including a racing heart, a feeling of excitement, excessive sweating, a sense of agitation bubbling from within, an unquenchable desire, a gentle, benevolent smile... Even its creators aren't sure why it turned out to be the legendary book it is. Supposedly, strange sounds like the chanting of Buddhist mantras were heard while the book was being written, but whether this affected its contents and completion or not is unclear. Fan Translation: Very common, should be no problem about this one;Buddhism Slow Life Essay. ... However, as I read it, palpitation, excitement, sweats, inner pain and frustation surged, resulting on archaic smile known to be the symptom. All concerned parties said, "I don't know how this could happened"; truly a legendary biblical book to tell. During time this doujinshi written, there is saying a strange phenomenon occurs; voice from nowhere can be heard. It is unknown whether that also contribute to the completion of this doujinshi.

Crossvikki Magician Girl and The Monster.Dialogue: A completely original fantasy story that follows the interaction between two protagonists from a faraway kingdom. One is a monster who was born from a war experiment. The other, a princess who, due to a witch's curse, possessed the lost magic and was held prisoner so she could become a secret weapon later in the war. Ideas for the story's conclusion ranged from the monster turning human once more to the two being separated forever, and so on... But in the end, both lose their powers but continue living their inhuman lives. Fan Translation: A completely original fantasy about the interaction between a monster born as an experiment for a war in a certain kingdom, and a sorcerous princess locked away as a trump card for the war, who was cursed by a witch and contained a supposedly lost "magecraft" within her body.  Various endings were planned, such as the monster turning back into a human, or the two separating for eternity, however, eventually, the ending was that they both lose their power but continue living in their grotesque forms.

Sea Angel.Dialogue: That's right, angels. They're angels. Okay, that's really just a metaphor... But just accept the fact that they're angels. Nobody will blame you if you find yourself spellbound by their gracefulness when you swim along with them. They forge their path through the great oceans, traveling the world. That's right. That is why I have blessed them, and if necessary, I can give them my banner, since I don't really need it now that I'm an Archer. Now, whether our enemy be a Kraken, sea serpent, Nessie, or even a megalodon, we'll be ready! Oh yes. While we're at it, let's see if we can borrow any unused weapons and armor from all the swimsuit Servants. Eh? What is it, Master? The dolphins might attack us? Teehee, you're such a worrywart, Master. Unless the Holy Grail contaminates the sea to create some sort of Singularity, I am almost completely certain that would never happen! Fan Translation: Yes, they are angels. You heard it, angels. No, well, I would be happy if people could view that statement as a figurative speech, anyway, they are angels. There's no way you wouldn't be charmed by their elegance when you swim with them. Boys and girls alike would push their way forward to the sea and travel all over the world. That's right, I gave all the blessings that I had for that purpose, if you want, shall I give you this flag that I no longer have use of now that I've become an Archer?  With this, even if the opponent is Kraken, Sea Serpent, Nessie, or Megalodon, you would be fine! That's it, if possible, let's borrow the weapons and armours that Summer Servants no longer use as well. Eh, what is it, Master? The dolphins would come to attack you? Master is the worrying type, huh? There is a 99% chance that it won't happen, even if the sea ends up being polluted by the Holy Grail!

Acting Like Tengu Set.Dialogue: In the western mountains, someone was bullying innocent wildlife. Hearing the animal's cry for help, the great tengu of Kurama leaps into action! "Why you insolent human...throwing rocks at a helpless animal. Have you no shame!? Take that...tengu stone! See how you like a taste of your own medicine!" "Ahahaha! See that, Tanukichi? Look at the way that human flees so pathetically! And now they're paralyzed with fear! They're never going to think of hurting animals ever again!" In the eastern mountains, someone was cutting down a helpless tree. Hearing the tree's soundless cry, the great tengu of Kurama leaps into action! "Those who do not cherish nature have no right to enter this mountain. Take that...great leafy whirlwind!" "Pffft! I didn't think they would fall into the river in just their underwear! Oooh, I'm laughing so hard! My sides! Ah, Risuzou...don't you worry. I've avenged your house. Now let's go look for a new home for you!" "Ahhh, a hard day's work of punishing others. Hm? What's wrong, Tanukichi and Risuzou? Behind me? What's behind me? M-m-m-m-m-m-m-m-master! It's not what you think! I wasn't doing anything bad... I was just punishing those scoundrels who were harming the mountain... And that's why I had no choice but to sneak off with your dress and fan... It's not my fault―" Play is truly the best form of training. But sometimes, one needs a bit of discipline (punishment) that may not be quite so fun... Fan Translation: On the west of the mountain, there is someone bullying innocent wildlife. Hearing the voice calling out for help, the Kurama Daitengu rushes over! "To throw stones at helpless animals. You insolent human, be ashamed of yourself! Come out, Tengu stones... See what it feels like to be thrown stones at!" "Ahahahah! Look at that, tanuki bros, the way that human run away is so unsightly! He is paralyzed with fear! Now he won't ever think about tormenting animals again!" On the east of the mountain, there is someone cutting down trees for fun. Hearing the silent voice of the trees, the Kurama Daitengu rushes over! "Those who do not value nature, are not qualified to enter the mountain! Eat this, tree leaf big whirlwind!"  "Poof! The  Fundoshi  falls into the river with just one leaf! How delightful and exhilarating! Ooh squirrel folks, I have removed the enemy of your home! Now let's look for a new house for you!" "Oh my, today I also punished a lot of people, punishing all day long! Nn, what's wrong, tanuki bros  and squirrel folks? Behind? Someone behind me...? Haaaaaaaa, Master! Oh that's not it, this is not playing pranks on people, but giving the scoundrels who bring harm to the mountain a little punishment. That's why I had to silently borrowed the costume and the hand fan, I'm not that bad or anything..." ...Playing is training, or something. However, once in a while, you also have to undertake trainings that can't be laughed at (punishment).

Crystals of Stacked Time.Dialogue: Of course I was able to enjoy my vacation, but all I remember is the pain, craziness, and desperation. That's pretty much my memory. But somehow, when I think about it, I can't help but smile. You too, right? These must all be a bright summer memory. It's an embarrassing memory, but a good one...a desperate struggle that should be cherished. And that's why you're gonna keep me company. Huh? Why're you trying to run away? It's time to read. I'll read them all cover-to-cover. And if I cry out from sheer embarrassment, you'll cover my mouth. Hard. Fan Translation: Of course I'm also able to enjoy the vacation! Although, what I can remember is how rough it was, fear and desperate; its that kind of feeling. However when I talk about it, somehow my mouth loosened. You too, right? This is probably my most memorable summer memories. Embarrassing, but I'm proud of it; this struggle is one precious experience. By the way, I'm going out for a while. I'm trying to fled? I'll read it. I'm gonna read it. When I'm about to make such odd noise, hold my mouth and gave me a drink!

Last Resort of the Abyss.Dialogue: The night is still, as if time has stopped. The calendar and clock are frozen at 11:59 PM on December 31, and they give no indication of moving forward. "Oh, were you still awake?" The girl smiles gently by your side. The name doesn't come to you. The observatory's lights may be out, but the sky is bright tonight. It's as if deep blackness veils your eyes. "It's quiet, isn't it? Looks like we're the only ones left." The sweet, gentle voice whispers. Your fingers go slack. Your memories start to grow hazy. Time comes to a standstill. And you still can't recall the name. "Teehee. Do you see this? The stars are all so beautiful." Looking up at the sky, it seems that it is now too late. An enormous abyss. Three red stars. The winter constellation gone mad. And a planet where all life has disappeared. Could this place be a crater on the surface of the moon? "Teehee. Hehehe...hehehehe..." ■■ smiles by your side. You can't recall the name. Not her name, but your own name. This is where you will spend your final night. A cage in the ravine of time and space. A honeymoon of confinement you can never escape. Fan Translation: It was as if time itself had stopped. The date has stopped at 31st December 23:59, and would not move for a while. "Oh, are you still awake?” The lovely girl at your side smiles. The name couldn’t be remembered. Though the lights of the observatory have dimmed, tonight the sky was bright. As if deep space had fallen before your eyes. "It's quiet. There doesn't seem to be anyone else here besides us." Her sweet voice whispers softly. Her relaxing fingertips. Memories blocked away.The time which resides.The name can't be remembered. "Fufu, please look. The stars are so beautiful." When you looked at the sky, it was all too late.The vast abyss.Three red stars.Maddened constellations of winter. A planet devoid of all life. Then, are you in a crater on the moon?"Fufu, ufufu, fufufufufu-----" The ■■ at your side smiles. The name can't be remembered. Not hers, but yours. That is your last night. That rearing cage in the interstice of time and space. A honeymoon in which you are trapped, and can never escape.

Much less a selfie...  she didn't even choose people as subjects for the photos she puts in her album. Of course, the heroes are no exception. She keeps the rendezvous entirely in her heart.  As for leaving behind a form, then the form of summer days works just fine...

Memories of the Earth.Dialogue: Dear Master of Earth, Servant Space is full of shooting stars as usual. I am busy every day, solving crimes that threaten space order...whether it be galactic idol units forming, Dark Rounds reuniting, or evil goddesses of ancient civilizations resurrecting. But I'm fine. I'm sorry. That's a lie. I made all that up. I'm just a little tired because I've been busy working nonstop. But whenever I feel discouraged, I look at this picture to cheer myself up. I'll never forget the time loop that was both never-ending and somehow over so quickly, or how super cool I looked during my tropical getaway. Now that I'm on a long-term mission, I won't be able to stop by Earth anytime soon, but everything should be back to normal by the time I visit again. And even if it hasn't, I'll solve that problem with brute force if I have to, so please don't worry. Until next time! P.S. I hear that this is the third crisis humanity is facing. Just how many close calls with extinction does humanity have to have? Fan Translation: Today, many meteors also fly through the Ether Cosmos. Star Clutter Idol forming, or Dark Round band getting back together, or the Goddess of an evil ancient civilization resurrecting, every day is full of incidents that disturb the Milky Way's order, but I'm fine. Actually no, I'm sorry, it was a lie, I lied.  It's a bit tough having to work and nothing else days after days. However, at times like this, when I look at this photo, the corner of my mouth unconsciously softened.  At the time that boisterous and gorgeous, supposedly never-ending loop came to an end, I would have the greatest recall of holidays at the most awesome southern country. At the moment, I'm in the middle of a long mission so I can't really stop by Earth, but when I can return there, everything would be like it was before, right?  If it wasn't, I would sort it out with manual labour, that's why don't worry about it.  Well then, see you soon.  I believe that you can save everyone with your courage! To my beloved Earth Master. PS: By the way, you said it was the third crisis, right?  How many times have the Human Foundation collapsed again?

Passion and Fury.Dialogue: When embarking on an adventure where life and death hang in the balance, take the demonic blade Móralltach and the demonic spear Gáe Dearg. Should the risk appear nothing more than in days of peace, take the demonic blade Beagalltach and demonic spear Gáe Buidhe. It is in this way that Diarmuid was said to have used his equipment for different occasions during his life as a Knight of Fianna. Now that he wields both demonic swords, what must he think of his manifestation? The answer is quite clear. He must simply continue to behave as a knight should. If he cannot wield both blade and spear as he did while he lived, then all he must do is serve his Master and always be prepared for battle. No matter his Spirit Origin, he must simply dedicate himself to discharging his duty. Fan Translation: When going into life-threatening adventures, He brings the Demonic Sword Moralltach and the Demonic Spear Gáe Dearg. If the danger is amount to that of time of peace, He brings the Demonic Sword Beagalltach and the Demonic Spear Gáe Buidhe. It is said that by having made proper use of his equipment like that when he was alive, Diarmuid flourished as a Knight of Fianna. In that case, I wonder how would he, who wields two Demonic Swords, Perceive the current state of the world? The answer is clear. ...That is, he would live his life devotedly as a knight. If he doesn't have the swords and spears like when he was alive, He would still serve his master with the resolution of someone on a battlefield. Whatever Spirit Origin he has,  He would devote his entire body and soul to fulfill his missions.

Miniature of Epang Palace.Dialogue: Its been a long time since the last time we spoke with someone on the same line of sight. The true nature of ourselves, is that figure who once reigning as a ruler. No, if we were speaking under common people sense, surely this figure of us is an inhuman ones. However, this figure of us is not to regretted, not to feel ashamed as well. Its natural outcome of the long-terms world unification. The form we finally achieved. As someone who once similar, I didn't want you to see it with fear. I only ask you to cherish it without feelings of being threatened. Behold, our figure that rules over the heaven.

Effect: Increases party's Buster and Quick performance by 10% while she is on the field.
The Book that She is Reading.Dialogue: Here, I don't need it anymore so I'll give it to you. Not an extraordinary, interesting book. I read through it many times. I also read it upside down, through different angles as well. As I thought, I cannot sympathize with humans sensibly. I did it to have fun, or so they said.  Still, it was convenient. Especially in the place known as Chaldea. The place where no one disturbs anyone who reads books; a place where I can spend my time easier than anywhere before. Yes, this is my shield.  The only thing I had to keep deceiving eyes of the others. Thus, there's no need for this again. I don't need to lie about it anymore, right.

Effect: Increases party's Quick performance and critical damage by 15% and reduces party's defense by 10% [Demerit] while he is on the field.
Magnificent Manger.Dialogue: How is it, this brilliance! Carrot, fodder and pail united as one. Definitely what a Holy Grail is---very beautiful ... Aaah, beautiful ...So beautiful ... So beautiful ... Such beauty ... A beauty ... Beautifully delicious ... *horse's neighs* Excuse me, but let's change the topic. Now, my dear Master. No need to refrain yourself. On such glorious manger, there's plenty of it enough for you as well. By all means, please enjoy every bites of it. Oh my, you didn't like it? Then, at least the carrot. Also, if you wouldn't mind--- ---Would you like to have a ride with me, accompanying me running through the morning meadow?

Effect: Increases Mystic Code EXP gained by 50.
Welcome to the Travelling Circus!.Dialogue: Thanks to the Gorgeous Owner P, Chaldea Group's Circus Show is starting! The circus trope lead by Leader Napoleon has arrived at Hokkaido, Miyagi, Osaka, and Kumamoto!

Effect: Increases Quick and Arts performance by 10%.
MLB Effect: Increases Quick and Arts performance by 12%.
Shvibzik Snow.Dialogue: Snow descends upon the Mexican city like a Christmas miracle."I wonder if it's an act of a mischievous imp." The ice princess's whisper reaches no one, before it melts into the bustle of the city.

Ring the Bell.Dialogue: On the holy night, an especially tall tree is shining brilliantly.Around it are Valkyries so lovely that they might be mistaken for heavenly messengers.Firecrackers, presents, everything is ready to go!"Gifts have been perfectly arranged.""Let's have fun! Merry Christmas!""This is a foreign celebration, but no matter. Our Lord's Tree is here. Let there be divine blessing and protection for all people."

Effect: Increases Buster and Quick performance by 8%.
MLB Effect: Increases Buster and Quick performance by 10%.
Holy Maiden's Teaching.Dialogue: In order to protect more people, a greater effort was necessary. Precisely because she sometimes had the strength to overcome ordeals, she became a holy maiden. Therefore her teachings often show a strict side. Mostly in a physical aspect.

Effect: Increases party's NP generation rate and
NP damage by 10% while she is on the field.
Angelica Cathay.Dialogue: No way, there's no way this ring could become my Noble Phantasm... ...Yeah. Originally it is not my Noble Phantasm.  It is an exceptional item belonged to Princess Angelica of the foreign country Cathay, and it is said that it is able to nullify all magecraft.  When I fought with the evil mage Atlantes, it was thanked to this ring that I was able to beat him.  Lady Angelica was very beautiful.  Both Rinaldo and Roland had their hearts stolen by her for a while.  Out of the twelve heroes, two fell in love with her, seriously what's with that charm! Princess, where are you and what are you doing right now... ..... .....  Ah, that's right.  This is not the era where I lived.  Yet, my old feelings got out, didn't it? How careless of me.  But seriously, if I could meet her again someday, that would be nice. Yes?  You think... If I keep borrowing this important ring, the princess would get angry when we reunite?  A-Ahh! That, that, that is surely!  What are you saying!  No-No way my A-chan would do that-!!

Effect: Increases party's Buster and Quick performance by 10% while she is on the field.
Feathered Serpent of the Holy Night.Dialogue: Merry Christmas! Merry Samba-mas! Feliz Navidad! On the The Holy Night where sound of joy (and the Samba rhythm) flutter about, the feathered serpent's underlings are busy distributing presents. Even if they don't have horns or are unable to walk on four legs, as Santa Claus' helpers, those guys are fine specimens of reindeer. "Now then, next up is going through Antarctica​ to Australia, and then to Asia! There are still people to bring presents and the joy of carnival to! Wait for me, ok, beloved humans-!" Under the command of the brightly coloured Santa who shakes her body cheerfully, the ancient  Pterosaur​s  take off in the snowing night sky. That scene in itself, is also... a kind of miracle.

New Year's Greetings.Dialogue: Happy New Year.  We're going to renew our resolution from  the first shrine visit  of 2019! But first, we are going to celebrate the start of a new life and do New Year's greetings.  Although it differs between each and every person, I hope that the wish you write on the  wooden plaque  comes true---

Craft Essence EXP Card: Boar King.Dialogue: Artoria Pendragon and the wild boar piglet. The two of them originally only had a predator and prey relationship, however, after a lengthy discussion, they reach a compromise.

Sign of Smiling Face.Dialogue: When the sound "kon" rings, the shuttlecock flies. Flies as far as we get along. It's fine even if we miss.  Because not just the marks on our faces, but the number of smiling faces would increase as well---

Effect: Increases Arts and Quick performance by 6%.
Charges NP gauge every turn by 4%.
MLB Effect: Increases Arts and Quick performance by 8%.
Charges NP gauge every turn by 5%.
New Year Sacred Mysteries.Dialogue: Beautiful! So this is the New Year Feast! Indeed, it is said the food is not chosen purely based on grandeur but also on the length it would keep, and the human who prepared the food also put it together with chopsticks, truly a pragmatic holiday feast!  Nn~, so delicious~!Since there is such a generous feast, doing things like making do with just the supplements is a no-no! This is harmony of the Japanese, the delightful New Year! Nice me, coming to the Wandering Sea was worth it...!  Next year, please give me the 3-tier food box, ok!

The Quiet & Reserved Pig.Dialogue: The useless and frail pig who was going to be turned into ground meat and the gentle spider who she forged a bond with. Is it okay for this cute piggy to become sausages? Absolutely not. The spider fought against fate, raising the flag of revolution against humanity.  Slurping up the blood of the peasants and burning down the barn.  "There is no need to say anything to you dying bastards".

Effect: Increases Quick, Arts and Buster performance by 6%.
MLB Effect: Increases Quick, Arts and Buster performance by 8%.
Silver-Glittering Snow Goddesses.Dialogue: The snow falls, pale and light. I walk through the nostalgic decorated hot spring district. When I turn towards the voice calling out, the gorgeous goddesses are waiting.

Effect: Increases party’s damage against enemies with
by 15% while she is on the field.
Vestiges Just Like the Spring.Dialogue: Aah, it came this year too.Even if it everything was a distant promise I'm really happy.The shape of the city has changed along the times,but only the spring in this mountain, as you can see, hasn't changed for many months and years. There were lots of joy.There were lots of memories.Days went by, seasons went by,Overlapping several encouters and farewells, people become adults.Kind lies, and the kindness to make a lie true,are already like a dream.Every time the wrinkles on the hands increase, a fairy-tale is forgotten. ―――But, even if I don't think back upon those vestiges anymore,I can just remember this spring's hanami. Having made this memory together itself,was the greatest pleasure for the bald that had no name. Please, may there be good luck in that life.Even if there are no fairytales reflected in your eyes,Beni will always be at your side

Effect: Increases party's Arts performance by 10% and critical damage by 15% while he is on the field.
Old and Strong.Dialogue: As I grow old, my strength fails me,and the ferocity I was born with calms down its roar. A mild everyday life dulls my skilland surprisingly, I accepted that. Yet still, yet still My fist and skill, know no defeat yet then, the skill they've been taught must be the strongest as well. And someday, a disciple who surpasses me will appear. Someday, I will be able to feel both resentment and relish from it. Well, who knows.I Might be undefeated until the very end though.

MLB Effect: Increases Mystic Code EXP gained by 50.
Enuma Dingir.Dialogue: The seventh Singularity identified at 2655BC. It is the era reigned by King Gilgamesh who finished his quest for the plant of immortality. However, due to the Three Goddess Alliance and the Magical Beasts, at the moment, Ancient time Mesopotamia was on the verge of being destroyed. The one who helped Fujimaru and co. when they faced against such an overwhelming force was... ...A Servant named "Enkidu".

Virtuous Pike and Shield.Dialogue: The knight once sit at the same table. Through time, even the colour of her soul has changed, The weapon and the shield that were supposed to be side by side are broken apart, In the end, they face each other under the perfect circle. At that place, there is no pride of bygone days, only mutual unyielding.

Encounter in the Dark Night.Dialogue: Who are you, you bastard... With that agility and that unknown swordsmanship. I also do not have any recollections of those sharp eyes that shine brighter than the city light illuminating the darkness. So why is it that I feel nostalgic about this man in front of me? You bastard, who are you...

Pure Destruction.Dialogue: If there is some kind of meaning to this battle, If it does exist, then it is nothing but pure destruction urge. And yet, for that reason, Those who saw it may have felt that only Gods were there.

Proof of Quickest.Dialogue: One must make their moves in anticipation of the opponent's each and every actions. However, if the other party can read my moves further, then I am going to predict even one instant further in the future... Faster, faster, even faster than the wind, so that I can prove it is I who is the fastest!

Paradox Ace Killer.Dialogue: "Please feel free to use your trump card.The match can come to an end in that instance, don't you think." Formerly a Sealing Designation Enforcer who retrieved a certain card.To the unknowing, that special armament means a fate of certain death.

Effect: Increases party's NP generation rate by 15% while she is on the field.
Recollections of My Mother.Dialogue: The Sakatsuki House, the house, which has been continuing on since the Tensho era, of my childhood. All the girls being born in that place have red eyes, and are said to have extraordinary power.  The children who receive human's thoughts, and unconsciously grant those wishes...  Child of God. The first person saved Fuyuki from a famine and passed away at the age of two.  The second one was exhausted of spirit beyond her life.  From the third one, their births were kept secret. The Sakatsuki's girls were brought up by the sole hands of their mother  inside a bounded field that keeps out human's thoughts.  That is the ritual to degenerate God into Human.  A hard-headed procedure that is the completely opposite of normal child-raising, in which not talking, not thinking, and not moving are considered correct. ...Then, what is the deal with those balls? The memory of those days that I spent with my mother is faint. It was doing the same thing over and over again in a mechanical way, isn't it, the monotonic and dull life of a mother and her child. The child of God becomes human, and finally realizes. That right there, there was definitely a mother's love.

Bitter Sweet.Dialogue: The Chocolate and the Dress are fully prepared. Even the delivery simulation is perfect. All that's left is just a little courage. However,  that person  just had to unexpectedly appear and follow me.

Effect: Charges NP gauge by 3% every turn.
MLB Effect: Charges NP gauge by 4% every turn.
Valkyrie Style.Dialogue: Adorn the hair; make the skin shine brilliantly as well. Once preparations are complete, don't forget the gift. While we are reluctant to accept such thoughts, we hope that our elder sister's feelings can reach them―――

Memory of Qualia.Dialogue: Let's look inside the pot. It's a sea of sweet, melty chocolate. Let's have a feast, with my best friends. Valentine's Day is like a sand castle on a beachfront; only a little bit of it can stay in the memories. This lovely tea party will pass by us, but may it leave me sweet happy memories.

Beautiful Dreamer.Dialogue: "Things like customs of the human have nothing to do with me."  The girl grumbled so and closed the door to her room.  However, after a while, under the pretense of killing time, she seems to be lost in some kind of thoughts.  Seriously, when will this girl be able to balance between compromises and vanity?

Effect: enemies by 20% while she is on the field.
Shin-Genji Monogatari Emaki.Dialogue: Good day, Master.Aah……This picture? Yes. In the so-called "Tale of Genji",I made up my mind to try adding pictures made by myself.It'd be nice if I could make picture scrolls. Eh……It's beautiful?Thank you very much. Actually―――This is based on the existing picture scroll.It's "Takayoshi Genji's Scroll of the Tale of Genji". Only the theme is changed.What I paint is the ninth chapter, Aoi.A chapter in which there isn't a picture scroll of Tadayoshi Genji.Yes. As you say.It's the same chapter as the picture scroll that appears as my Noble Phantasm. I don't have any self-awareness in particular, but……I like it. This chapter.Or――― Perhaps this chapter is engraved in my soul. Fufu.Master, what do you think?

Rainy Bridge.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Asagami Fujino. A masterpiece created by utilizing everything she learned during Housekeeping study in Girls' school. Donuts seem to be the staple food of the welcome parties at her boarding school. "I choose the food that I can make most delicious, without making it weird." shows Fujino's thoughtfulness. On top of that, the intricate added chocolate is no doubt, her hobby and passion, That is to say, her handmade chocolate, filled with deep affection.

Viy (Standalone).Dialogue: Valentine gift from Anastasia. Not fixated on chocolate, the Imperial Princess prepared a Viy newer than Shvibzik as a present.It moves in the middle of the night, intercepting lawless people who enter the room......is what it was supposed to do, but it ended up forming a rivalry with the other stuffed doll that's been occupying the room before it.Every night a fierce battle unfolds between the two. 「But it's alright. My Viy will win for sure!」 The Imperial Princess is bragging.

Headlong Rush Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine chocolate from Atalanta Alter. Created in the motif of the Demonic Beast, Calydon, its shape and quality are quite excellent.The pink parts are made with strawberry chocolate.To be suitable for children, it is somewhat sweet. 「Well, it's that, you know. I thought you might be tired of eating apples. If you could share this with the children, I would be grateful.」

Chocolate-style Mini Golem.Dialogue: Valentine's gifts from Avicebron. They are chocolate-formula mini golems with cute toddle-like walk. The nice smell of chocolate hang in the air as they walk around, which makes them very popular to the children, however... They are inedible, which is a major flaw. Despite that fact, occasionally there are still bite marks on them, and even to this day, the criminal oni has not been brought to light. ???"Y, you are wrong... It's not me..."

Reading a Book with my Beloved Child.Dialogue: Valentine's gift from Ivan the Lightning Emperor. Because of Master's persistent request, it ended up being reading fairy tales by their bedside. From the look of it, the Emperor was also thinking about how to give Master a peaceful sleep. The fairy tales are Russian folktales. Whether they are funny tales or adventurous legends, or perhaps things like cruel stories, he would read them to Master regardless of the genres. So it seems that voice, which sound like a reverberation through your guts, made Master relaxed.

Jet Black Conductor's Baton.Dialogue: A gift (?) from Salieri. It's a conductor's baton that is burning like wildfire. It's black, as if it was made from shadows. It's a replica of the conductor's baton that he used back when he was alive... Or not, while I'm not sure about that, when I look at its shape, it seems to match the approximate era.

Xanthos.Dialogue: Valentine's gift from Achilles...? It's one of the sacred horses bestowed upon Achilles by his father.  Although it rarely talks, when it does, it does at the worst timing possible. "There is a saying "Those who hinder people's love would be kicked by a horse", but if the offender himself is a horse then how would it be? Gushishishishi." Since it keeps muttering evil things like that, the people around Master and the (Demi) Servants are looking out for them in concern.

Primary-Grade Conferment.Dialogue: Valentine's gift from Chiron. Unfortunately, it's not graduation, but simply the lowest rank conferment.  When you graduate, you would receive the certificate that you've become a worthy hero.  Even at the lowest rank, you would still have an extreme advantage in finding a job, and a recommendation in your resume. "Every heroes start at the lowest rank. Now, let's set our sights on the second-rank next!" Chiron-sensei's class has just begun!

Bedside Fafnir.Dialogue: A return gift of valentine from Sieg. Now that he had received chocolate, he had to give something in return. So he thought and mulled and consulted all over.  Taking inspiration from the words of the Seven Gods of Good Fortune, he decided to draw a picture. This was the first time in his life he ever carried out the act of illustration; it was quite the hard struggle, but he eventually surmounted this trial. "I hope this will stop you from seeing nightmares... should I include events under the nightmare exception list?"

Oden Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Okita Souji (Alter). Prepared by Majin-san, this is a product of eternity, born from the meeting between some delicious thing and another delicious thing. It seems to have been made using the pocket money she saved up from helping out with cleaning the baths every day. For some reason, Rengoku was clattering and trembling when it was being made. Horror. Despite how it looks, it doesn't taste bad. Actually, that miso dengaku-like flavour is surprisingly delicious. Good job, Majin-san. ---A fragment of a memory that remains unforgotten even at the end of that long, long path. Under that empty sky, it continues to stand. [Still, honestly speaking, Majin-san has never once wondered whether beef sinew and crab would go well together. In fact they probably wouldn't.]

Pocket Watch & Frog Chocolate.Dialogue: A little gift from Sakamoto with some chocolate from Oryou. The timepiece is a foreign one he got in stock for trading, while the frog chocolate was kneaded by Oryou herself. Ah, they don't contain any real frog- of course- rest at east. Oryou knew what she was doing. "Why it's always been my dream to deal in these foreign goods, you see. Eh? Include Oryou's frog chocolate in my lineup? Why of course, I'll display them in the finest spot we have." ───That was the dragon and serpent's shop of dreams that would never come to be.

Cotton Muffler.Dialogue: A return gift from Okada Izou. The same sort of cotton muffler Izou wears around his neck, but this one has some patterning making it somewhat stylish. A muffler that may or may not have seen some popularity around the end of the Tokugawa Shogunate, but it seems they were originally intended for old retirees and sick patients.  "If ya co'er yer mouth like this, they can't make 'eads er tails 'f yer face at night, so it's the perfect piece for a manslayer... what? Yer sayin' we're wearin' matchin' outfits? You shut that stupid mouth!!" "─── Well, just take care no one takes yer neck while ya sleep."

Military Rations (Canned).Dialogue: Valentine's return gift from Napoleon. Multiple canned goods filled to the brim with food. On each and every cans, the crest of Emperor Napoleon is boldly affixed on the outside.  They are indeed Napoleon-brand's canned food. "Come on! These are the perfected provisions of the Grande Armée​!  With these bad boys, even the Russian Winter would get beaten to a pulp!" He seems to be quite confident in their preservation capability. The same goes for their nutrition and taste. They are the result of every Professional Heroic Spirits' collaboration. Thus, it is obvious that he would be confident in them. You can bring them on your next journey, or you can even open a canned food party in the neighbourhood on the weekends.

Glasses.Dialogue: A Valentine’s gift from Sigurd. Ultra-special glasses created with an Primeval Rune.Blocks what the eyes cannot handle, and suppresses the harmful effects caused by intense light and pollen.Eye fatigue such as eye strain and the like are restored by the rune,and while studying, a rune that increases your ability to concentrate is activated.Truly these super-glasses could not be any more perfect. In addition, Sigurd once said, “By wearing these glasses, my life has suddenly become rose-colored,” though it isn’t certain whether he truly said those words. He probably didn’t.

Amethyst Candy.Dialogue: A gift from the Valkyries. The valkyrie's shield---This is candy made to look like the purple crystal that adorns the shield made of divine steel. Although it's called candy, no sugar was used in its making. There is a sweetness reminiscent of honey to it. Its taste seems to have been seasoned with magical energy. It goes without saying that this appearance is the greatest sign of respect that those manifested girls can express. It is the embodiment of their adoration.

Ice Candy.Dialogue: A gift from Scáthach-Skaði. A traditional ice candy called ice pop. ...Or something that looks like it. It's cold, it's sweet, and it's delicious. "I remember that it was sweet.  But not from the sugar.  It was the spell that added a little flavour to the ice.  It was not as refined as this one." She smiles.  Seemingly reminiscing something of distant past. "It was the first in one or two hundred years, I think...  I've also walked around giving them to my children.  It was fun. It was.  Aahh...  Right, the truth is..." She smiles.  Seemingly grieving the things that are no longer here.

White Dolphin Dream.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Jeanne d'Arc (Archer). That's why I tried to design it with the concept of dolphins leaping in mind! Ufufu, it's amazing, isn't it? It's wonderful, isn't it? Go on, you can sing praises for this older sister, you know...! Now then, the time for you to appreciate this is about to end. That's right, chocolate is made to be eaten. This sister was looking forward to this while she was making it, tasting it, and filching it! Looking forward to the moment the two of us eat this chocolate together... Let's cut it up so it's easier to it!

Cotton Candy.Dialogue: A gift from Ibaraki Douji (Lancer). The same cotton candy that she frequently munches on. It seems that  EMIYA  was the one who made it. It's sweet and fluffy.

Mt. Kurama's Delicacy: Aralia-shaped Man.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Ushiwakamaru (Assassin). A confection with soft castella and sweet chocolate inside. "Ha-ha-ha! As is fitting of me, it exudes playfulness and originality! There's no doubt Master will be happy!" By the way, this shape resembles the leaves of a plant that is also called "Tengu's fan."  It is NOT a maple leaf.  And it has ABSOLUTELY NOTHING to do with a certain Hiroshima specialty. Nothing at all!!

Knoten Herz Schokolade.Dialogue: A Valentine's chocolate from Jeanne Alter (Berserker). What. It's fine if it's edible, isn't it.It might be cracked and it looks like a failure and it might've become a mess and it looks like a failure but at any rate you can eat it so it's fine, isn't it! At the very least, right? At the very least, the taste alone is delicious, so it's nothing to complain about, isn't it!Next year, be prepared for next year, got it!?The next chocolate will be a chocolate that will definitely make you cry tears of happiness and hunger for it like a pig! Eh, what. You're already very happy with this chocolate?Hmph! Hmph! Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm!! (satisfied)

Master in The Chocolate.Dialogue: A forbidden Valentines Chocolate from BB. Ordered straight from the manufacturer, modeled after Luluhawa Island, a chocolate so elaborate it could be mistaken for the real deal. A conceptual space chocolate imbued with the simple notion of sweet, simply sweet days melting away. ―――Is the island made of chocolate?―――Is chocolate made of the island? Now that you have been captured by it, you will never know for all eternity. The vacation repeats again and again  in an endless cycle; there is not a single other soul to be found in this God-forsaken place. Not in the future or the past, there is no way of escape.

Dark Chocolate with Medb-chan Crest.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Medb (Saber). It reminds people of the so-called brand chocolate assortment in terms of the elegant casing and the various-shaped chocolate. There's a  familiar "Medb-chan" crest affixed on the outside of the box. While it looks so perfect it seems like store-bought...  This time, no doubt, it was made by Queen Medb herself.  It's packed full with cacao, mana, and thoughts, with just one bite, you are sure to become a good-looking brave or a slave. Whether you become a brave or a slave depends on your resistance, courage, and willpower.

Nebula Sweet.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Mysterious Heroine XX. They are sweets that shine bright and sparkle in space.  Their deliciousness doesn't stop at five-star rank, in fact, it can be said to be Supernova rank. "What do you think? With the authority of a Cosmos Soldier, I got this customized order-made from the most prominent well-known store in the Milky Way. Eh? They look so cool but it's too much? Fufu, as expected of Master-kun, you got it all figured out. When you think about it, two are more heroine-like than one, right?" I wonder if that's the case. I think a heroine wouldn't choose chocolate's motif based on their weapons.

A Fruit from Emain Ablach.Dialogue: A gift from Diarmuid (Saber). It's a fruit with a nice lustrous bright red colour. It's shining brightly. It's something that decorates the land with splendour. It's something that the hero Bran, who is related to Diarmuid's foster father -the sea God Manannán-, had previously found in one of the  Otherworld  that was introduced in Celtic mythology ( Immram ). It looks like an apple. And it even tastes like an apple.

Snow-Viewing White Chocolate.Dialogue: A gift from Sitonai. White chocolate with a thin cover, similar to that of  Gyuhi . It melts in your mouth like snow. I thought that it was something made using only the data from the Simulator, but it wasn't the case at all.  Since they are gifts for the Heroic Spirits she likes, Sitonai has, in fact, made the real same thing. Now then.  Let's go with her to distribute the presents.

Gohou Shoujo Chocolate.Dialogue: A Valentine's chocolate from Shuten Dōji (Caster). A chocolate placed in a box that looks like merchandise from weekend anime targeted towards little girls. The character drawn on the box is of course the Gouhou Shoujo. Furthermore, although it was Shuten Dōji (Caster) who proposed it, it seems that both the Queen of Sheba and Caesar had a hand in the design, development and sales of the product.

Xiang Yu's Sword.Dialogue: Valentine’s return gift from Xiang Yu. The battle-seasoned weapon that paved the way for the Eternal Qin Empire in the Lostbelt to conquer the world.The harshness of the many battles it has endured is evident by its worn state.

Beauty-Concealing Mask (CE).Dialogue: A Valentine's gift from Prince of Lanling. But this mask...does it really have any other effect besides hiding the face...? Are you certain? I think there would be a great number of Servants who would be disappointed if Master hides their face...hm. Santa Island masks that are popular with children? I see...so it can go in that direction too...I see...

Panda.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Qin Liangyu. It might sound weird coming from me since I made these myself, but!  Don't you think they are a bit too cute!?  Uuh, if I can be honest, it seems like a waste to eat them.  Please at least take some photos or videos as keepsakes, I would be happy if you do. That's right! We should give these four guys names! Eh, doing so would make much harder to eat them?  It is just as you say, Master...

Elixir of Immortality.Dialogue: Bestowed confections from Qin Shi Huang.In other words, Valentine chocolate. It was said to grant immortality when drank, however, it's efficacy cannot be ascertained until one actually drinks it.Sure enough...

Chalcedony Chocolate.Dialogue: Return gift bestowed by Qin Shi Huang.In other words, a return gift for Valentine's. Chocolate cake carved from chalcedony.The exquisite beauty that makes it impossible to tell apart from the real thing, is close to even the Jadeite Cabbage and the Meat-shaped Stone that are renowned as great treasures in quality.

Up-to-Date Gifted Confectionery.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate received from Consort Yu. Yu made this chocolate by hand, after independently researching Valentine's Day. Outwardly, it appears to be flawless, high-end chocolate. However, it seems that she took the idea that chocolate is a 'sweet, black dessert' and ran away with it, because the base ingredient is not cacao, but something like condensed black sesame paste. If you think of it as a mooncake minus the dough instead, it is quite delectable. "Hmph. Well, this kind of experience comes with age. Perhaps you see me in a new light now? Then you can kindly double your respect for me, starting from tomorrow."

Supreme Carrots.Dialogue: A return gift from Red Hare. Carrots with wonderful color and sheen. These are top-class articles cultivated in the basement facility. Loaded with nutrients! Delicious! If you bring them to the kitchen you can get them cooked up. The menu changes based on whichever servant is there, so why not make a few trips?

Hippo-chan.Dialogue: Valentine chocolate from Bradamante. Tight chocolate in the shape of Hippogriff ...... that was deformed shortens the head and body. Cute. The white fur is white chocolate. The dark hair is the normal chocolate. Is it a coincidence or necessity that looks exactly like Hippo Gurumi? Please say Gaburi! Says Bradamante, but it may be too cute to eat.

Campana de Lucha Libre Chocorata.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Quetzalcoatl (Samba/Santa). And so the ambivalence started. You feel fear, you were startled. You feel the weakness of wanting to run away if you had the chance. But, even so, he swallowed the feelings inside him. All he wanted was to save his son, and he pulled the trigger. One might say that the shot is a work done by God. However, it had nothing to do with God. It was the human thought, the thought of being a father, that allowed him to be able to use his skills precisely. This isn't a story of a legendary hero, this is just a story of a man. Folding the tree branches, shaving them away with a knife, and bit by bit, putting it all in order――― And when I finally came to finish it, I felt as though I loved it. This incomplete thing, as incomplete as it is, is something I made. It's small, but it's a sense of pride an almighty god can never possess.

And then, right, at that time, if I am told something like "You lost because you are not the original Rider class...", it would make me annoyed, so I thought I would give up on the Rider class, and left it at that.That's the reason I manifested as a Lancer. Ahahahahaha!"

Women of Agartha.Dialogue: An overflowing fantasy city, a vicious Utopia, ruled by a variety of flowers, the deranged women... A mountainous subterranean land in Central Asia, 2000 AD.  The Organization for the Preservation of Human Order, Chaldea, discovers the existence of a Singularity at that place, where formal wars or incidents are not confirmed.  Under the instruction of Da Vinci, Fujimaru Ritsuka and co. immediately rayshift, however...

Tournament of the Seven Blade-Master Her.Dialogue: The consciousness of Chaldea Master, Ritsuka, was suddenly taken away to the Edo period. Ritsuka reunited with the Swordswoman Miyamoto Musashi, whom they had once met in a dream, in a Shimousa that follows a different history.  The two of them struggle through mortal combats with the seven Heroic Swordmasters who unleash gruesome massacre​s...

Morning Glory.Dialogue: Let's travel. Because the brilliantly beaming midsummer's sunlight also tenderly transforms the morning glory's cap. Slowly, slowly. While doing things like reminiscing about the days gone by. Let's travel together.

Sunday Dinner.Dialogue: Tonight, the proud alchemist of the Musik family Will take you to the height of palate's bliss. Now, you there. Savor the bewitching banquet of delicacy made by the mage carrying the name of Phoenix thoroughly! That's right, this is definitely the ultimate gourmet magecraft!! ...There is a possibility that it has nothing to do with magecraft and simply just the skills of the head chef, however, no one in particular is pointing it out.

Detective Fou-mes.Dialogue: Those eyes that filled with intelligence seemingly able to see through everything are Quiet and calm, but addressing a lot things. That "He has already gathered the evidence." That "Come on now, admit it." That "This is no longer deducting, but "verifying the answer"." "Fou Fou Fou. Fouu" But, it is kind of sad, isn't it? The chance of this brilliant deduction reaching his partner is almost non.

Beautiful Journey.Dialogue: Following the tracks. Wheels turning. The location the "Universal Man" headed for. Towards the "Giant Horse" she dreamed of. Our advance won't stop. No matter how high the sky is, or how wide the world is,Even if, for example, the world has turned blank white. What is that waiting over the horizon? Is it the future we've been longing for? Is it a new threat? Whatever it may be, my heart trembles with excitement. Even after this journey ends, your adventure will continue. I'm proud of that above all else. The memories of a wonderful journey. The companions on a wonderful journey. My wonderful life. ────Aah. Everything is beautiful, like a painting.

At Dream's End.Dialogue: "Here lies the end of my dream. The remnants of my dream. I wanted to become a king. I wanted to be praised as an excellent king. For that sake, I contacted a woman I didn't like, whispered to her, and committed a few too many crimes. No, well, maybe 'little' might be selling it a bit too short. Maybe. ... ... I cut ties with that woman as a witch. Even though I tried to do the right thing, it seems like I did it the wrong way. Somehow, it seems like they saw that as a punishment. Ah, shit. Next time; there won't be a next time, huh. Give me another chance! Next time I'll properly, seriously, carefully, correctly... Do it, I'll show you! ... ... Damn... ..."

Ought to Think Carefully.Dialogue: I see, I totally get it now!  Then, I just need to choose the most beautiful one, right!  I don't know!  Eh? You will give me a reward? Bribery?  I see, anything goes in a competition between the Gods.  I can win the war? Become a King?  Hmm... None of those seem right...  The most beautiful person in the world will become my wife?  Then I choose this!  ---Ahh, why can't I never think about these things carefully!?

Effect: Increases party's Quick performance by 10% and

Ring of Metamorphosis.Dialogue: One of the Noble Phantasms possessed by Gareth.  It is a ring of mystery Lady Lyoness bestowed upon her in her lifetime. A ring that changes to all sorts of colors And allows its user to change appearance. It is said this ring proved terribly useful as Gareth concealed her identity as she took part in jousting match after jousting match. 　◆ Why mystery, you see, It does make this an item of wonder, but… It’s also an item to be feared. There are plenty of times I was saved thanks to this ring, but There are also instances where I was put through the unthinkable. The one that chills me to this day, yes… It was when I had to duke it out with my brother Gawain while the ring was concealing my identity! Two hours, I tell you. The match continued for two freaking hours. My mind and body were falling apart there. Only my pride as a knight kept me on my feet. But my brother, see— Yes, it was during the day, you see… So as you might expect… You could just tell he was full of energy… He just doesn’t get tired, that brother of mine…!
