Pirates' Rule.Dialogue: Got it? One who called himself a pirate must not be sloppy. Things like pillaging as you please, drinking then rampaging as you please... You must give up that kind of pirates' pipe dream immediately. The important things are discipline, rules, and feeling of fellowship. One for all, and all for one. There are nothing that you can do because you're a pirate, however, There are so many things you must not do because you're a pirate. Even then, you still want to join my pirate ship, huh? If you want to join, then... Welcome to the Bartholomew Pirate Gang! As a pirate, you must truly want to raise your name, right?

Effect: Increases party's NP generation rate and
NP damage by 10% while he is on the field.
Spring-Viewing.Dialogue: I dare say I wouldn't be able to see spring. The strategist muttered during the siege. You wouldn't think the man was rumoured to be cruel, ruthless, and merciless, It was such a gentle smile. It was obvious that what awaits the defeated strategist is death. There is neither dissatisfaction nor fear there. However, there is frustration. The master and lord that he looked up to are no longer alive. That is also not a particularly painful thing. As much as I do feel guilty about it. The soldiers under my command would reorganize and survive, wouldn't they? That is also not a particularly joyous thing. Since they would be thrown into a different battle, and sooner or later, are destined to die, aren't they? The lives of the families who were summoned to Xiapi Castle would be... Well. This can only be expected of the opponent's personal virtue. That is to say, the phase where everything would turn out alright with the strategist's effort has already passed by a long time ago. Now, everything is simply nostalgic. They embraced their big ambitions, lived in battles, and talked about many dreams. Everything is a mirage catching glimpses of the end. The last thing that he sees is not the battlefield, the so-called spring banquet is, oh my... This is quite unexpected, you didn't understand what I was saying?

Effect: while she is on the field.
Angel's Assassination.Dialogue: Without this assassination, I would have never been summoned as a Servant. But this assassination should not have gone down in history. This was what I thought: If that person dies, the world and society will surely improve. ―――How stupid. I wish I had failed. I wish I had been killed instead. I should have changed my mind on the way and gone back. I am a murderer. I am an assassin. A hopeless sinner. Still. Still, one good thing came out of all of this. I met you. That's the only thing―――

Effect: by 20% while she is on the field.
Jokanaan's Head.Dialogue: A pile of skulls――― Crystal skulls. The Noble Phantasm of Heroic Spirit Salome, which was how she could freely use magic without magic circuits. Such amazing skulls. Salome speaks, whispering to you, "All of the skulls piled up here, Are the 'Jokanaan's Head' that I love forever." ...that's strange. The decapitated prophet John was the only one in history. Then, if the first skull is John's, Jokanaan's Head, what about the other skulls in the pile? Ah,  are they perhaps the heads of Masters who succeeded in summoning her?

Welcome Bunny.Dialogue: Now then, enjoy, everyone! Losing or winning are both a matter of chance, to call or to fold are both your decision. Whose hand would the Goddess of Victory's blessing fall into tonight? May the fortune of war go to you!

Purple Eye.Dialogue: When I become aware of it, the sun is already set. The hustle bustle under the bright sun, while hard to believe, has passed, The town's twilight has turned dazzling and glittering a short while ago. The purple eyes glint bewitchingly.

Summer Enma-Tei.Dialogue: She would go the distant for the customers' request. This year's Enma-Tei is offering a Special Sushi Set limited for the summer. The exquisite cuisine that makes celebrities throughout the world moan Even captures the interest of a Goddess feeling the heat fatigue.

Poolside Bar.Dialogue: The twilight signals the time of the feast. Reflected on the water surface cladded in light is, The smile of the close relative, or the whim of the God? Drinking up the trickling blessing, together into the circle of the banquet.

Ladies & Gentlemen.Dialogue: What people wish for is here now. The greatest show in history is starting! The guide are Napoleon, the man of possibilities, and the legendary dragon hunter. This is the one more incomprehensible more than Marengo itself, The Flying General, Who interprets the ocean as the grassland and somehow is able to swim! This is an unprecedented experience which no one has ever seen that you guys have been waiting for! However you say it, the likes of "impossible" are just not in my dictionary!

Yan Tan Tethera.Dialogue: One sheep, two sheep... The young boy who abandons himself to the swaying hammock by the waterside is dozing off. Even though this place is so far away from his former hometown, Only the blessing of the Sun God and the warmth of his brother is Even now, always unchanging.

Unforgettable Summer, Two Heavens as One.Dialogue: Even though I've wandered many worlds, none was more delightful than that summer. Even though my journey has already ended, yours has not seen its end. Indulging in a trip of sword attacking, tumult, and gambling. A new world piled up with laughing with each other, competing with each other, and conquests. The selfish me or the futile death is just a mirage overshadowed by sunlight at this place. Even an independent   non-abiding  practitioner of martial arts could learn from an ordinary dream. Even so, I'm sorry, I'm just an unnecessary weight for you down the road. As a one-time fun, everything will be returned. ...The final moment, concealed within my bosom. The blue sky, the scorching wind. The memory of a sword blossom dancing summer spent together with you.

Iron Maiden (Summer).Dialogue: ...A red silhouette that cuts up the dark of night... ...Dangerous speed that doesn't stop... You seem to be worrying about this car. I might have already said it, But this is my Iron Maiden with its shape changed. A summer swimsuit, if you will. That kind of thing could happen, you know? By the way, currently it has been given the name, Laura. The reason? Fufu... Are you bothered by that? That's right, it might have been the name of a girl who had entertained me in the past or so, I wonder. Very adorable convulsing face, and screams like that of a fine opera... Oh, just recalling it makes me so excited. Ahh, I'm so sorry, I didn't mean to make you jealous. After this, there is no chance that I wouldn't give this car a new name that is yours. I trust you to entertain me more than her... Become my favourite, ok? That's why, come on, give me a good show of all your cute sides tonight. Even if you're scared, I won't allow you to close your eyelids. Please keep your eyes wide open, and let yourself be intoxicated by the speed of my fantasy. That's why... Accelerate full throttle!

Chinsetsu Yumiharizuki.Dialogue: "Chinsetsu Yumiharizuki" Strange Tales of the Crescent Moon. A  reading book  by the Author  Kyokutei Bakin  who was known for his work " The Chronicles of the Eight Dog Heroes of the Satomi Clan of Nanso ".  Katsushika Hokusai was in charge of the illustrations and gained tremendous popularity with the Edo readers of that time. It is said that the  Keshi dolls  (at that time was called Bean dolls) wearing clothes, made by the skillful fingers of Katsushika's daughter, Oei (Oui), sold very well. The young Oei became absorbed in the reading books, things like the hero of Strange Tales of the Crescent Moon, Minamoto no Tametomo, or the Palace of the Dragon King's nymph from the picture book "Kinkasekiei" illustrated by Hokusai's student, Katsushika Hokusuu became her favourite, she might even have made them into Keshi dolls' models.

Many people are attracted to this board.Customers who visit Casino Camelot for the first time almost always play roulette on this board. This board isOnce in Camelot, imitating a round table,Is there anyone really aware of it? Of course, the Aloha Knights know.The main swimsuit lion king also knows. A holy swordsman from a different worldHe saw this board and stopped moving for about 10 seconds.

Solo Stage.Dialogue: The Summer of water has ended.  The sparkling show has also closed its curtains.  The Suiten-gū built upon the desert, as if following those fairy tales,  disappeared into a night's dream.  The goddess' whims won't last for long.  My stage was also some kind of mistake.  But just a little bit more. My meager string of light.  If this spotlight left on would become the dazzling of star.  Even if you're gone from memory,  or even if it turns out that you're gone from this world.  I shall gift you, with feelings full of gratitude a very special element just for you. Her memories eternally blue.  The swan, alone, reminisces of a past love.

Beyond the Azure Sky.Dialogue: A book of the unknowable Rural Galaxy sword technique "Jet Tennen Rishin-ryu" known as the heretical Tennen Rishin-ryu of a Singularity somewhere. The day I impart upon you this hidden secret technique has arrived, those painful and rigid days of training come alive in my mind. However, it wasn't just days of pain. There were also memories of one summer in that sparkling, shining, boisterous, and delightful foreign country. The fight with the Mysterious Demon King, Me as a teacher and Master fighting together in a dream, finally gaining the hidden secret technique after wandering about the boundary between life and death, the watermelon that we split in the watermelon-splitting game, the soggy but still delicious Yakisoba, the shaved ice that turns our tongue blue... I'm sorry, I had gone off-topic.  That's right, there is no longer any needs for words for the time Master and I spent together. Now, inherit your teacher's, my, secret moves and legacy, and become the true Samurai that soars through the galaxy. ...Go beyond the cloudless blue sky- Eh? You said you didn't want it!? Why...

Salem of the Heresy.Dialogue: As a result of Chaldea's efforts, the plan to incinerate Humanity of the one who called himself the King of Mages was prevented narrowly at the edge. The fate of the world is once again can be seen to blow in the other direction. However, all of the sudden, a Singularity of the same level as the ones until now is observed at the present time. A master who once cleared the future, In order to suppress the Pseudo-Singularity that appeared at the Cursed Land "Salem", Dedicates herself to Rayshift again.

Round and Round.Dialogue: There were neither any reasons nor premonitions, The King of Heroes was sullen. It is not uncommon of him to sulk, however, This time, something is different. There are beautiful dazzling New York skyscrapers and, White rose flower petals scattering about the extravagant room. Although they are said to be the light of an acceptable civilization, they are all so foolish, From the bottom of his heart, he is unable to get excited. Even though he is the King of Heroes, he still feels this discomfort, What the hell is this chill that runs through and soaks his back...

Fly Off.Dialogue: "Even though it is a waste in function to get involved. Somehow, something not good is approaching." A beautiful weapon arrived at a certain airport. Maybe his friend called for him, Or maybe he heard the voice of his friend not calling out for him? ---At first glance, there is something behind that gentle smiling face, sure enough---

Effect: Charges NP gauge by 1% every turn.
MLB Effect: Charges NP gauge by 2% every turn.
From Uruk.Dialogue: The store was at the center of the festival. Not to mention the extensive product lineup, The response to the participants is really amazing. When he is healed by the tenderness of the hostess, It is said that many people go frequently. But be careful with the golden sheep.

Effect: Grants Guts status for 1 time. (Revive with 1 HP.)
MLB Effect: Grants Guts status for 1 time. (Revive with 1 HP.)
Jewel Bride.Dialogue: The bride is imprisoned within the glass of isolation. As beautiful as jewelry, As if the trick of the devil. You are the only one who can help. Because rescuing the captive princess is always the duty of the hero.

Effect: Increases Arts and Buster performance by 8%.
MLB Effect: Increases Arts and Buster performance by 10%.
Scenic Beauty.Dialogue: A red bridge pierces through the blue sky. Once in a while, instead of looking down from the heaven, A sightseeing to admire things from earth has its own charm. Take a sip of the space-flavoured drink and be in high spirits. The Goddess is always Gorgeous, Happy, and Elegant!

Absolute Demonic Battlefront Babylonia.Dialogue: The Security Organization for the Preservation of Humanity, Chaldea, continues to fight to restore the history of mankind following its incineration. The seventh Singularity, recently discovered, proves to located in ancient Mesopotamia in the year 2655 B.C. A fateful age, when humanity and the gods parted ways. Master Ritsuka Fujimaru and Demi-Servant Mash Kyrielight have raced through six previous Singularities... In this new Singularity, the greatest threat they have faced thus far awaits...

Princess of Red Bean Paste.Dialogue: The Princess who lives in the pitch black castle starts her day with a beautiful Japanese clover's fruit in her small mouth, befitting her appearance. When the sunlight reaches the summit, She passes the time by sailing a night boat with a smooth appearance like that of a willowy body to her throat. And then, when she gazes at the curtain of twinkling stars, She ends her day by admiring that northern window overflowed by emotions the same as that beautiful voice. Ahh, that is surely the beauty of decadence, the princess of destruction. A destiny begins and ends with red bean paste. The same with the fate of our DR empire... Plonk...

Effect: Overcharges NP by 1 stage for 1 time.
MLB Effect: Overcharges NP by 1 stage for 1 time.
Planet Rock.Dialogue: The guys have enmity towards each other.  To the point where walking down the same path, shoulder to shoulder,  is near to impossible.  The only choice is to face their backs towards each other.  An element so strong that no one can compare,   the acknowledgement as archenemies.  Because of that, they become the best combination.  If they work together ever for once,  no doubt it would cause a storm of plasma.

To Pursue Literary and Military Arts Sim.Dialogue: If you run after two hares, you will catch neither. That's a good saying from the olden days nya. Human life is mostly a series of failures, isn't it? However and everrr! If you call yourself a Goddess, then it's just right to catch both! You have your sight on military arts! You're smart! And you're also sexy! That is indeed the way to be a tiger! But, isn't this lady of the scales more muscled than me, nya?

Twin Star Divas.Dialogue: Let us sing. To You who head towards the evening twilight--- Let us sing. To You who approach the crack of dawn--- So that you don't waver, so that you don't get lost, Let this singing voice show you the path you must take. Let us sing, let us sing, let us sing. For we can definitely come across wonderful things. Yes. Of course. Wonderful for "us", that is.

Effect: Increases Quick and Buster performance by 10%.
MLB Effect: Increases Quick and Buster performance by 15%.
Bestia del Sol.Dialogue: At the time you cross this sea (galaxy), There are things you absolutely must avoid. Is it running out of fuel? Wrong. Is it running out of food? That's not it. Things like that are actually just trivial things, really. You would even think eating the sun is easy, Compared to coming across the most sinister female pirate gang...

Craft Essence EXP Card: My First Curry.Dialogue: Homemade curry made by a certain Master. Homemade curry roux, which is a lost practice in the Universe, and doesn't come from a ready-made bag. Disregards of the financial situation, there is a large amount of vegetable and meat added in. I have never seen such extravagance curry! To explain it bluntly, this is used to strengthen craft essences.

Craft Essence EXP Card: Mysterious Subst.Dialogue: A mysterious substance that would come in handy in a certain galaxy. If you use it to strengthen Craft Essences, they would be filled with an incredible energy. Sometimes it's hard, sometimes it's soft. It seems to be cold, but it also seems to be warm. It's such an excellent fuel that even space ships also use it. "This is from Space's 100-yen shop, woof!" Cat has extensive knowledge.

Effect: Increases party's Buster, Arts and Quick performances by 8% while she is on the field.
Towards the Cosmos of Reunion.Dialogue: And thus, the humanity of Earth has (how many times has it been now) overcome another crisis, The Organization for the Preservation of Human Order Chaldea that we know was blessed by the people,  Thus, while regretfully, it was closed down. The ordinary Master returned to their everyday's life, while running around trying to sort out things that happened during the time they were away,  Somehow took a step forward (got an unofficial job offer) as a full-fledged member of society. (The person themselves later says "It was thanked to the three major skills in my mind... First-aid, momentary reinforcement, and emergency evasion") However. On the night of the previous day before they starts their working adult life. The former Master of the deserted astronomical observatory that watched over the stars Saw a falling mysterious meteorite and a message right before their eyes. "Maanna has finally arrived!? Okay, then jump right on and turn on the engine! Just now I was in a serious troubl-, ah, ouch, no no no~! Ah-Come one, please help me, Masterrrr!" After getting over their surprise and blanking out for a moment, the former Master,  While breaking out a smile "oh dear", got on the spaceship. The time is Universe Calendar, Season 6.5. The solution to the "Cosmos Three Goddess Alliance" affair is  Entrusted to a certain frontier cosmos' Earthling.

Effect: Increases own NP damage by 30% and gains 20 critical stars (1 time) while she is on the field.
Cheerleader of Shooting Stars.Dialogue: I don't know much about this universe. This me here is just as you see! From the beginning, it's not something cool like a hero or anything, Just a traveler who wanted to go far-away, who is bad at staying at one place, and always wanting to stay excited. That's why I don't have a home or any money at all! The only thing left with me are the many memories, And the loneliness like a tickling sensation in my chest at the time of departure. But this time, I'm staying at one place for a bit longer~☆ I mean, this place is just so much fun! To you who don't get bothered by the nickname Calamity, I would do my best to cover your back! Yay! And they are the pompoms that circle around many stars, Cheering the victory of many companions. While boasting about having nothing, She continued to hold onto these treasured Pole Stars-like items until the very end.

Chaldea Dinnertime.Dialogue: A night spent together with special people will surely become an important memory. I hope that, even when we are at the end of this never-ending journey, we can look back at the wonderful memory of this day with a smile. ...Here's to hoping that we will be together when it comes to the time we reminiscent about it.

Effect: Increases Mystic Code EXP gained by 50.
And So the Holy Sword Shines.Dialogue: February 1991 AD. The Tokyo Holy Grail War. Many heroes were lost, and many tears were shed. The Lesser Grail is filled with souls. At the cradle called the Underground Holy Grail, Beast VI quickens. Before the world ends and love fulfilled, the girl smirks. However. At this place. The King of Knight who found his answer in the small sparkle--- Finally, unleashes The Holy Sword.

Maidens' Luncheon Party.Dialogue: Let the Holy Night wait a bit more. Christmas' dress-up and, The hustle and bustle of the festival is still so far away. Because enjoying the special day's lunch leisurely is also A natural etiquette for a maiden.

Deliverers of Wishes.Dialogue: The figure holding such a large baggage that can't fit in both arms Is just like a modern Santa Claus. According to the Servant, They are presents filled with all the gratitude for Master. To be entrusted with requests and wishes, I can't help it but feel somewhat nostalgic, however,---If it is such a warm burden like this, let's make sure we carry them as much as possible.

With My Family.Dialogue: Let's walk like we're equals. The many packages are filled with joy, And the only part you carried is warm, It's no big deal no matter how heavy they are. I wish this irreplaceable time Would continue forever and ever.

Traces of Christmas.Dialogue: In the dazzling night, many blessings fall. To you who develop love with your lover. To you who warm up friendship with your friend. To you who deepen bond with your family. To you who continue to fight for someone's sake. To everyone. Sincerely, from every generations of Santa.

Effect: Increases own NP damage by 30% and increases own critical damage of Buster Cards by 100% for 3 turns.
Leaving Behind the Sword for a Moment.Dialogue: Even if says, this is the second life, I'm still me, you know? That's why I thought something along the lines that things would definitely remain unchanged, however... No, that was not the case at all! Everyday is heart-pounding, squealing, tingling, enjoyable, and interesting, it's the best thing ever! But like, I don't have much to give to you, the thing that you want, I definitely don't have it. Servants can only give you happiness by damaging and breaking things. Ah, even then... Even then, I still want to give you a present. Happy New Year, Valentine, Halloween, Christmas, whatever the seasons, whatever the occasions, I want to be by your side.I don't think I can fulfill your wish, but being only by being with you, it is the one and only thing that I can do by my own choice! Now, let's sing, let's dance. Why don't we celebrate this day today?

Effect: Increases party's Quick performance by 10% and healing received by 20% while she is on the field.
Merry Christmas.Dialogue: ... You say a Servant doesn't dream? What nonsense is that? Surely there is nothing amiss with enjoying a dream or two come sleeping-time. Why it happened to me, just last night I say. Servants need no sleep? Good grief. I have no time for your jokes… …… Come to think of it… Last time I rested on a bed… yes, when was the last time… no, I must be imagining it. Right, yes. We were talking about dreams. I dreamt for the first in a very long time. I witnessed what felt like the events of long, long ago, but they could just as well have happened yesterday. Strangely enough, they left me with a peaceful feeling in my chest. Perhaps dreams aren’t bad from time to time. Yes? You want to know about an umbrella-like machine gun and red outfit? What are you talking about? I always wear my proper military uniform on the battlefield.  Commander, good grief, you really are… oh. Just maybe… you too…  saw a whimsical dream of your own.

Effect: Overcharges NP by 2 stage for 3 times.
MLB Effect: Overcharges NP by 2 stage for 4 times.
The One who Desires Salvation.Dialogue: There was an undying hatred within this heart. This world is where people who must be saved go on a path that cannot be saved, While the irredeemable enjoy life. However, if I close my eyelids, I could see it. I would come to understand the so-called truth that even those heinous people could be extremely ordinary humans, having an ordinary existence. In that case, even Good, even Evil, even people who should be adored, even people who should be hated, All of their sorrow, I would love it deep, deeply. Continue to keep the hatred in my heart sealed off. For the sake of saving everybody from the distortion of the world. Even if, says, my heart would get distorted too.

Dawn of an Ambition.Dialogue: They said sooner or later, this tree would rot. The branches of blood relationship that should have spread splendidly broke off like it had been pruned completely. Therefore, that man had no other ways but to plant a new seed. I would not embellish this with things like hope or beautiful words. However, let's see to it that I return the favour to those who rejected me. Before long, it grows, beneath the golden tree. The man simply set his sight on ahead.

Effect: Increases critical damage of Arts Cards by 25%.
MLB Effect: Increases critical damage of Arts Cards by 30%.
Noble Piece.Dialogue: It is not necessary to have things like the meanings of our lives. It is also not necessary to think and act for yourself. Just an existence that is merely being born, and merely being used. That was supposed to be our, and "his" fate as well. Or so it was supposed to be.

Effect: Increases Buster, Arts and Quick performance by 6%.
MLB Effect: Increases Buster, Arts and Quick performance by 8%.
Argonauts.Dialogue: The determination was just there. Having a strong will that he would not lose, he sworn to never give up until the end and ran through. ───This is the painting of a dream. An impossible world where heroes independent from the Gods all gathered on a single ship. Even so, you could still see it. The brave figures sailing away at daybreak.

Effect: Gain 8 Critical Stars per turn and Increases all party's Critical Damage by 15% while he is on the field.
Hunter of the Stars.Dialogue: ...Just like that, the stars ascend to the Heaven without any problems. Three stars shaped like a belt, Betelgeuse and Rigel represent the body. The stars that are supposedly exist over yonder, as the symbol of his body, Continue to be in the Heavens. However, it is not eternal, its brightness hold for But a few hours. Just like the essence of human's life, you manifest with the stars, And leave with the stars. I think it is quite sad. Every time come noon, having to wait for the night to arrive. But. You think that it is the right thing, don't you? Orion. My darling, the person becoming the Hero who becomes the Stars, becoming a Servant, to meet me. Perhaps some day, I would make a mistake. Perhaps I would commit an error so fatal, that it would destroy this formed world. I do not want to think that kind of thing would happen. Supposedly, it happens. If it would come to that. Together with Master, Shoot me down with your arrow, ok? That's right,  if you make just this promise, Then no matter what, I could stay with you forever. Only with the proof that we can kill each other, That you and I can be equal. That's why, let's watch the stars today. Watching your stars that are sparkling beautifully.

Effect: Increases all party's attack damage by 20% and defense by 30% for 3 turns when he is defeated.
The Sword that Breaks, When the Battle C.Dialogue: However, it had become awfully tattered again. There is a tree branch around there that is suitable to make another, I have only been using it as a substitute for Durandal anyway. It's a weapon that I don't particularly care about... No, it's not even a weapon, It really is just a wooden sword that can be found anywhere. Seeing it broken like this, somehow it's just  that Sad... That's right, it's sad, isn't it. ...When I was alive, I made a lot of mistakes. I committed a lot of outrageous behaviour, there were very inhumane acts as well. If it wasn't used by a guy like me, This fellow wouldn't have crumbled to dust in a place like this. Darn it, somehow it made me cry. There is no will behind it, it's just a wooden sword. It has done well coming this far with me. With your help, I was able to protect Master. Thank you.

Effect: Increases all party's Arts and Buster Card Performance by 10% while she is on the field.
White Bull.Dialogue: Hmm..Taurus? He was gifted to me by Lord Zeus. Isn’t he so cute? He looks almost like Lord Zeus himself. Hmm? Ah, it’s not okay to refer to Lord Zeus as being cute? Ah.. that’s true. Knowing Lord Zeus, there is a chance he might take it in the wrong way. But, you know what Lord Zeus is honestly really really cute and amazing! It would have been fine if Taurus looked like Lord Zeus too you know. I don’t know why he had to go out of his way to make it look like his bull form! Well, even so he’s still really cute. That’s what I felt the day we first met too. Haha, what I’m going on about doesn’t make sense? I’m sure the day where you understand will come eventually Master.

Effect: Increases Mystic Code EXP gained by 50.
Capsule Servant.Dialogue: Capsule Servant!! Brought forth by the Great Holy Grail, they are the Heroic Spirits (?) that you have seen before, in this style. Materialized with the establishment of Pseudo-Servants small scale summon method called Capsule Summon, they are something used for children's spinning top battles in the future.

Fate/stay night -Tracing 15 Years-.Dialogue: January 30, 2004. TYPE-MOON released the romantic action visual novel "Fate/Stay Night". It has been 15 years since then. The miracle brought forth by "Fate/Stay Night", the path that TYPE-MOON has taken. Everything that it has been, and everything it will be from now on.

Effect: Increases Mystic Code EXP gained by 50.
Chaldea Park Caravan.Dialogue: Chaldea Park - the dream space filled to the brim with a lot of attractions and events! This winter, it has become a caravan, and is coming to Fukuoka, Aichi, Ishikawa, and Osaka!

Knowing the Way Broadly.Dialogue: Because the beginning of the year has yet to be tainted with anything, I give my greetings with colourless and transparent, straightforward eyes. Like the sky that we looked up at together one day, I wish the road you have to conquer would become clear.

Clear Beginnings.Dialogue: -Pound- -Pound- From one month to the next -Pound- -Pound- The circle of smiling faces spread out That is the sound of happiness, known by the name of tranquility.

MLB Effect: Increase critical star generation rate by 2.0%.
We are Friends.Dialogue: While they are called brown rats As long as you keep them clean I think you would definitely be able to understand Their lovely intelligent true nature. I want you to become good friends.

Craft Essence EXP Card: Cornered Rat.Dialogue: Even if you put a bell on the cat's neck Since it already made you its target It would chase you anywhere you go I think getting caught is just a matter of time.

Effect: Increases own NP Damage by 30% & Inflicts Spread of Fire status for 3 turns on normal attack.
Purple Jade Flute.Dialogue: An elegant dragon flute made from purple gem (Jade). One of Yang Guifei's favourite musical instruments along the  Pipa . It is said to be a gift from the Moon nymph " Chang'e "  to Yang Guifei. "I want to try something like playing this single flute with two people at the same time... That joke, again, also becomes a pleasant tune."

Those who Observe the Stars.Dialogue: They can observe all things, and so understand that some things cannot be changed. They can observe all things, and so understand that some things can be changed. A flower easily bends and yields when it's exposed to the elements and strong winds. Yet, no matter how fragile it may be, flowers (humans) also have the ability and potential to firmly plant their roots even in solid rocks... They are keenly aware of this. Fan Translation: They foresee everything, therefore, They understand that there are things that cannot be changed. They foresee everything, therefore, They know that there are things that can be changed. Flowers, upon exposure to strong wind, are extremely easy to break apart. However, no matter how weak they are, there are still flowers (people) who can wedge their roots into hard rocks... They understand it all.

Effect: Charges NP gauge by 2% every turn.
MLB Effect: Charges NP gauge by 3% every turn.
Therapeutic Spa.Dialogue: Relaxation establishment, That is the place where exhausted warriors gather to heal. The resentment of the day also melts into this hot water, and the hands combing my hair remind me of the days gone-by... "By the way, why the hell are you combing my hair? Are you thinking about the easy way to slice my neck clean off, Or are you just looking?" "No, I'm not just looking. I was wondering how on earth were you brought up, to have this kind of crude, violent, and troublesome personalities. Seriously, I just can't understand it. Please start over once again from childhood." "... (Hmm, in this situation, even I can't say,  what happens to me today may happen to you tomorrow, you idiot.)"

Effect: Increases Mystic Code EXP gained by 50.
Shinjuku Phantom Incident.Dialogue: Shinjuku, 1999... A new Singularity appeared before Fujimaru Ritsuka and everyone at Chaldea, who restored Human Order. What awaited Fujimaru, Who rayshifted again in order to eliminate the distortion in history, Was a metropolis turned Territory of Malice. Running through the end of century's skyscraper where a plan of perfect crime was started Together with the mysterious Servant who introduced himself as the "Archer of Shinjuku".

Effect: Increases Mystic Code EXP gained by 1%.
MLB Effect: Increases Mystic Code EXP gained by 5%.
Gran Cavallo.Dialogue: They go forwards, riding on an unfinished horse. Even when not knowing where the destination is, While repeatedly going through many encounters and partings, They never forget to smile. They take on everything happens on the blanched earth, and tackle the journey with vigour and vibrancy.

Chocolate Heaven.Dialogue: I was told it would happen unexpectedly unashamedly during the broad daylight. By no means should there be any love there. Don't expect a sweet smile. Even after it melts from the heat, there is still a bitter aftertaste, isn't it. I understand, even though I do understand it...

Effect: Increases buff success rate on self by 10%.
MLB Effect: Increases buff success rate on self by 15%.
Queen's Dream.Dialogue: I have a long long dream. The fruits dripping with bittersweet bitter chocolate in smooth cream  is accented with sourness and colours. Let's take another nap while waiting for the faraway awakening.

Midnight Tension.Dialogue: You have to prepare for everything perfectly. It is even more so for a maiden's momentous crucial decisions. However,  She suddenly comes to a realization late at night of the day before. Could it be that... I made too much!?

Knit the Love.Dialogue: A handmade gift. I made it with the colours that suit you, I made it so that it is easy to use, Because I want you to be warm even on cold days. The feelings put into it are warmer than anything...

Effect: Increase Party's Np Acquisition Rate by 10% & Critical Damage by 10%, for as long as she is on the field.
Chaldea Picture Diary.Dialogue: Seemingly chock-full of fun things and experiences. A notebook decorated in colorful stickers, sticky notes, and seals from her.We don’t know how much the pages filled to the brim with her handwriting mean to her, but no matter what is said or done the words found within are definitely those of the present Sei Shōnagon. The things she likes, the things she had trouble with. Her experiences of seeing things for the first time, meeting people for the first time. The one who is dear to her even now. And… “Don’t show it to anyone, okay?” Saying that, she laughs.

Grand Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from King Protea.  It's a heart-shaped chocolate, but as you can see, it's more than 100 meters in size. The material other than chocolate was not prepared (there was no fruit to match the size), so it is a simple design, but the overflowing feeling is shown on the surface of the chocolate.  By the way, why the beach? It's because Protea's dream is a sweet home with a seaside pool.

Affectionate (Sneer) Choco.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Kama. Valentine... It is the event where you are allowed to give your love to others in the form of sweets.  There are many types of love in this world. Pure love, indulging love, comfortable love, stimulating love, and even curse-like love.  This chocolate is filled with everything mentioned.  It has the taste of unrestrained and unfathomable love.  The one eating it would, undoubtedly, be spoiled by it and be bewitched by it without end.  For as long as they desire love, there would be no human who isn't satisfied by it. "Now now. No need to hold back.  Please taste my love to the fullest, alright? Ufufu...?  ......... Haa. It would have been nice if you had died." At the tip of her outstretched hand is all the love of this world.  However, within that hand is..

Mercury Choco.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Sima Yi (Reines). An item ordered from somewhere, though the wrapping is from Reines' favourite confectionery in London.  According to Reines' words, it was extracted and refined from the Supreme Mystic Code: Volumen Hydrargyrum, however, it is unclear on how much of it is the truth. Now then.  Let's see whether you have the courage to eat it or not.

Stars and Wine Chocolate.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Astraea. The chocolate that I ate with Astraea. It was mildly sweet dark chocolate, and the outside was decorated with glittering stars. The wine cork was still firmly sealed. The Goddess of the Scales has been waiting for the day to open this bottle. The impossible promise has been fulfilled, making this a miraculous moment.

Fudge.Dialogue: A gift from Gray. They are simply candies. Traditional English confections that are surprisingly sweet, but that sweetness goes very well with coffee.  They are well-known as the candies that grandmothers give to their grandchildren as treats, Gray's mother, who came from Wales, probably made it for her with the same sentiments. Although it was likely before her face started to "change". In addition, thanks to Gordolf and the Red Archer's interference, they turn out to be not too sweet.

Premier Chocolate Cake.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Great Statue God. It's a chocolate-flavoured premium roll cake.  It seems to be very sweet. It even comes with Chai (tea)!  A white-haired Lancer who heard about it later commented "You can't do that, Jinako!". It actually is a commodity that cannot be found in Chaldea, but you know, by using the Great God's power, she forcefully took possession of it.

Embodiment of Good Luck.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Lakshmibai. It's a miraculous product, finally completed after being reworked many times over with perseverance and determination.  The shape is slightly ill-formed, but the taste is perfectly palatable.  It actually is quite delicious.  This dish teaches us that the truly important thing in cooking is not technique but rather sincerity. ...The Goddess of Sorrow and Misfortune, undoubtedly, understands better than anyone that this world is filled with good luck.

Beginner-Use Hunting Set.Dialogue: Valentine's return gift from William Tell. A hunting instruments set that is not aimed at professionals, its simple usability and safety is emphasized for beginners' uses.  If you use this, even if it was your first hunt, you would still be able to catch a prey with ease... That's not the case at all. Hunting is not that easy. However, if you use it, and follow the instruction of a reliable senior hunter, at least you would not get injured or get into trouble, and would be able to descend from the mountain safely. While it is not wrong to say the only catch you would get from your first hunt is fatigue, that is also...a true pleasure of the hunt.

An Ordinary Miraculous Stone.Dialogue: Return gift from Arjuna (Alter). You can say it holds little to no value in magecraft as well as artistry.  It is also only averagely polished, and averagely beautiful.  Its worth is entirely up to you, the recipient. Do you consider it an insignificant and imitation gem...  Or do you consider it as an important treasure given to you by an important comrade? As long as its luster and the stone itself is beautiful, then other values are of no concern.

Late Night Chat.Dialogue: Return gift from Aśvatthāman. To be more precise, the thing itself is not the return gift.  He is talking to you, and getting to know you more as a Heroic Spirit, as a leader, and as a Servant. This right here is him opening his heart to you, and that is more valuable than anything. Now then, let's talk. The night is long, and the topics are endless.

Medical-Use Choco.Dialogue: Valentine's gift from Asclepius. They are chocolate... tablets, powder, capsules, and liquid-filled syringes. Putting tastes aside, their benefits are exceptional.  While only the doctor understands specifically where and how it works, he promises that just by simply taking them, you would become healthy. Please follow the usage directions and dosage carefully.  Do note that if you forget to eat them, or if you share them with others, he would get angry at you like a demon and treat you like an idiotic patient.

Dried Persimmons.Dialogue: Chocolate... No, dried persimmons from Demon King Nobunaga. Dried persimmons from  Mino . It was said that back when they were alive, Nobunaga only gave this to the people they liked. While simple in itself, it's a beautifully refined item that lets you experience the mild sweetness of nature. Among the people who were given this dried persimmon, it was said that there was someone who became a Great Feudal Lord of a fief yielding millions  koku  of rice, there was also one who was eaten away by despair, and there was even one who became the ruler of the country. "...Now then, I wonder what kind of people you would turn out to be."

Fool's Gourd.Dialogue: Return gift from Oda Kippoushi. The gourd that Kippoushi hung on his waist, which he was often seen with it when he became the laughing stock for many Daimyou as the Fool of Owari. It is a very ordinary black gourd that doesn't have any special origin whatsoever. During this period, Nobunaga deliberately dressed in an eccentric fashion and frequently paraded around the castle town. While even those who looked down on him as a fool, and those who realized the meaning of that action weren't sure about his true motives, all that is of the Fool of Owari started thence. Wahahahahaha! You are also the Fool of Chaldea, aren't ya!

A Short Rest with Tea Preparation.Dialogue: Return gift from Mori Nagayoshi. A short rest with tea ceremony to entertain you in a two tatami mats wide tearoom. In that small room, so small that you are knee to knee with each other around the tea kettle, each and every movements of the host are conduct with a purpose to give you blissful enjoyable moments. ...Or so that was the intention, but well, to hell with the difficult stuff. Let's serve each other however we want to, drink however we want to, kinda like killing each other. By the way, what do you think about this red tea bowl? I think the  Rikyuu  house has a black  Raku , but I do prefer this red tea bowl. Since I don't have to worry about blood splattering all over the place with it. Uhyahahahaha! Oh well, just take a sip!

Bishamonten Choco.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Nagao Kagetora. It's a chocolate statue of Tohachi Bishamonten, the grotesque Biten who wields many treasured swords and spears in his hand to destroy the enemies of Buddhism. Anyway, since Bishamonten  looks absurdly strong, I still greatly respect him, even in this form. Yes, really. By the way, since wood carving was my pastime hobby when I entered Buddhist monkhood, my wood carving ability, or you can think of that as level, is quite high. This chocolate statue was also made by Kagetora herself with the Ittobori (one-blade carving) method. Putting that aside, let's stop talking about the whole monkhood thing. This is THE Bishamonten of Echigo! Meow!

Chaldea New Order.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from the young girl Da Vinci. The original Leonardo Da Vinci could craft a gorgeous piece of chocolate, but the young girl Da Vinci is still lacking in ability, so she couldn't make the shape to become that high caliber of artistic quality.  However, her feeling definitely doesn't lose to her original self's.  The piece of chocolate imitating Shadow Border on top of the cake is actually a perfect preservation of dreams.  If you don't eat it, it would continue to exist forever (as a model), and become a certain memory.

Miniature Argo.Dialogue: Return gift from Jason. Good grief... There is someone actually serious about this kind of thing?  Though, maybe he had help from Medea?  Somehow those dolls have very good feels about them. Aah, there is this guy, and that guy, and Heracles is here too. How's that, look at them, Master.  Argonauts is the best, right? Right!?

Apollo Figure.Dialogue: Return gift from Paris. It's an Apollo doll.  It follows after Ku-chan doll and Viy doll, and matches against trespassers (invaders) who came into the room. Ku-chan attacks, Viy defends, and then Apollo performs buffs. They would devise a plan to intercept upon sensing intruders, and protect Master's sleep without getting seen.  Once it a while, they are unable to do so.

Choco Cupcake.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Gareth. They are a bunch of sweet and moist chocolate cupcakes.  I made it for Brother Gawain, the adored Sir Lancelot, Mordred, Mr. Jekyll, and then more than anything, for Master.  I want everyone to eat them, and if you say it was delicious, I would be very happy, and thus, I baked them with all my heart. One day, I would like Brother Agravain​ to eat them too...  That's what Gareth secretly wished for.

Peek-a-Bang Wigs.Dialogue: Return gift from Bartholomew.  A masterpiece that makes both Master and Servants go "Oh it's scary all right", "It surely is eye-catching", "I don't know what to make of it". Just by putting it on, anyone can be Master, peak-a-bangs style.  Actually, if you put it on, you can become Master? For the handful of Servants who realized that detail, an extremely gruesome battle blew up between them concerning that wig, however, there are still those who haven't noticed a single thing.

Xia Dynasty's Universal Fountain Pen & W.Dialogue: A gift from Chen Gong. Let me explain. In order to put an emergency stop to a precision bombing weapon when it goes rampage, the weapon is equipped with a safety device.  However, if you were to intentionally and indiscriminately make that device malfunction, wouldn't modern warfare become unparalleled?...  Having thought that, the super strategist made this inhumane weapon, the Xia Dynasty's Universal Fountain Pen. "There is no better hidden feature than this for an item to celebrate your coming-of-age.  It is said that there are seven enemies when you enter society.  Thus, self-defense is a vital factor to your growth.  The wooden writing strip? Ahh, that one is a bonus.  These lessons are not meant to show their effects immediately.  It's fine if you just read them in your free time." Sure enough, there is no need to say which gift is more important.

Present for My Beloved Darling (You).Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Charlotte Corday. It's a masterpiece made by one who has surpassed the so-called professional level, that even a professional would have a hard time reaching that height.  It's packed full with all the feelings in my heart, but since it was packed too full, it's hard to see those feelings clearly. I wonder if you have noticed it?  To make this chocolate leave even just a little bit of impression, I have exhausted all my techniques on it. Of course you would notice it.  Her struggles and dedication, you understand them all.  Or at least, that's what she convinced herself.

From Salome, To You.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Salome. They are small skull-shaped chocolate piled on top of a replica of the "silver tray" that Salome usually carries around.  When you put them into your mouth, you would be bewitched by sweetness, that sweet and sweet chocolate.  Not that there are any types of curses on them...  Or so it should have been...  But when I stare intently at them, I feel disturbed from the bottom of my heart.  Perhaps they were made with some forms of magic, but if I leave them be at room temperature, they would melt.  That's why, I must hurry and eat them.  All of them .

Parfait Demon Sword Buster.Dialogue: Swimsuit Musashi's Valentine Chocolate. "It technically has some chocolate in it, so it still counts, if barely", she says. It comes with two spoons and two straws so you can eat it as a couple.The stick cakes pierced into the chocolate parfait symbolize Musashi's 5 katanas.If you try to shared them equally, you'll get one katana left, but the two are to decide how to eat it at their discretion. You came for a fight, didn't you, Miyamoto Musashi?

Wagashi-Styled Choco + Letters.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Osakabehime (Archer). The elaborated chocolate themselves already give off considerable uneasiness, but the letter is the most problematic.  The letter written in the midst of night when she was highly excited just vomit intense feelings towards you in details.  Things such as the last letter being missing are just trivial things.  Since her feelings already shot through your heart. ...The important thing though, is that Osakabehime was relieved it was just one letter that was left out.

Absolutely Not Stolen For You Choco.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Carmilla (Rider). ...It's a fleeting bewitching bloody sweet...  ...I offer you this wholehearted gift... It's a super high-grade chocolate put inside a glamorous case as gorgeous as a jewelry box.  It has a red wine colour that makes you think of lipstick, with just a right amount of bitterness and the smell of Brandy, giving it an adult's flavour.  It comes with a card that looks like a mysterious calling card, but there is no message written on it. Of course there isn't.  Because the chocolate itself is already a declaration that something important of yours would be stolen away.

Choco Choco Octopus Netsuke.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Katsushika Hokusai (Saber). They are modeled after the characters from the "(may be) favourite" reading book of Katsushika's daughter "Oei (Oui)", Chinsetsu Yumiharizuki.  Her father and everybody at Chaldea are also made in exquisite details. "What are you talking about, I don't know any Va,VaVaVaVaVaVa...Va-lenti-ne! This, this is just, simple gift-sharing! It's normal goodwill, no that's not it, it's filled with gratitude... Don't look at me and grin like that, also don't be crunching on them so quickly!"

Chocolate Cake Bunny White.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from the Swimsuit Lion King Artoria Ruler. It's a gorgeous Royal White Chocolate Cake.  The white bunny dancing on top of it is lovely.  Actually, the decorating playing cards are also made from chocolate, and thus, edible.  On the other hand, the flowers are real flowers, and thus, inedible.  If you point out the bunny's cuteness, it would make Artoria Ruler extremely happy.  However.  You must not make any comments about her normally-not-shown jovial expressions.  You must absolutely hold yourself back.  If you utter even a single word of your thoughts about her merry state, she would immediately return to her normal self.

Bluebird Jelly Ice.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Mysterious Alter Ego Λ. They are not ornaments, but blue jelly chocolate in the shape of Leviathan.  While they do have a lovely design, they are actually Stars.  They don't melt when you eat them, still, whether they melt spiritually or not is up for debate. By the way, it's completely irrelevant, but when you talk about the Antarctica, you have to mention the penguins. And if you talk about penguins, you have to mention the Antarctica.  It might not be exaggerating to say one who rules over penguins, also rules over the Antarctic continent.

Jet Choco Y\u014dkan\u200b.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Okita J. Souji. Great Great Great Victory for Swimsuit Okita-san~!! Of course, since Okita-san has always achieved victory since the Bakumatsu era, she is not being happy over such a  thing as swimsuit or anything!  This is perhaps the Jet chocolate youkan that Okita-san, the  punch -like First Commanding Officer of the Shinsengumi who is happy about the swimsuit, went to buy using the Jet, and caused a stir in town even now. Since the Jet is an Universe secret, you cannot talk about it at all, however, the taste itself is very delicious. Think back of the blue sky that the two of you flew through on that summer day.

Space Diorama Choco.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from the Space-like Ishtars. There are Maanna, Dark Maanna, and Bell Maanna, the trio of dreams.  This is how they look if you mount them one on top of the other.  Because they are so generous, they even tried to display it like a diorama. It's a masterpiece that be left as it is, because if even one piece is missing, a space war between the Goddesses would break out again.  I can only see a future where it would be treated as a mysterious Out-of-place artifact from the previous universe of unknown seasons ago.

Bunny Ears.Dialogue: Return gift from Astolfo (Saber). Put this on , your Servant whose sanity has already evaporated says. Even if you petition against it, try to run away, or counter-attack, with all due respect, it's all pointless. Mashu Kyrielight, the camerawoman, is also all done with the preparation. It's totally absolutely fine for you to be a bunny the way your heart desires.

Springy Kagami Mochi Choco.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Astolfo (Saber). I don't know how they came up with this, but it has an incredible springy texture while still maintaining white chocolate flavour. The mass is quite large, however, you still have to be careful so that you do not choke on it.

Chocolate-Flavoured Ampoule.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Nightingale Santa. It's the bullet from the weapon Florence Nightingale used when she temporarily transformed into a Santa Spirit Origin, the menacing medical code Assault Medicine.  However, instead of the usual green medicine, it becomes a chocolate-coloured medicine. That's right.  I said it was Valentine's chocolate, but strictly speaking, it's not chocolate.  It's drug (medicine). It seems this medicine works very well against the particular bacteria that causes tooth decay, that's why you will be fine even if you eat a lot of chocolate.  You can say it's an apt medicine for Valentine.

Tri-Star Belt (Handmade).Dialogue: Return gift from Super Orion. It's a dazzling tri-star belt made from pieces and bits of various materials. If you put it on, not only your hunting skills would increase, but it is also a good substitute for your Mystic Code also.  Looking at the components of the tri-star, it seems he wanted to add a transformation function, however, as expected, he gave up on it. ...Although, once the inventors catch wind of this subject, they become greatly interested it it.

Durandal Replica.Dialogue: Return gift from Mandricardo. It's a replica of Durandal.  While it is only a replica, the reproduction quality is quite good.  When you wave it around, it plays a very nice and pleasant electronic sound, thus it makes you feel like waving this amazing sword around all the time. It would be fun to pretend play Hektor together with Paris or Mandricardo. It seems he tried to recreate Durandal's hardness, as the plastic part is considerably solid.

Homemade Brownies and Hot-Milk.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Europa. There is a dish-full of dense brownies, which are the consort Europa's favourite, and a cup of steaming hot milk.  It's a combination that is very popular to team young Heroic Spirits.  If you are seen eating it, you would definitely be swarmed with "How nice!", "I want it too!", "Hmmm, good for you". This flat baked chocolate cake cut into squares, brownies, with its carefully made moist and chewiness would make you addicted to it. The crunchiness of the nuts mixed in to put some emphasizes on the texture is also excellent. "If you eat too much, you won't have room for dinner, so eat in moderation, all right?  If you like it, I will make it for you again!"

Hua Qing Palace Confectionery Hot Spring.Dialogue: Special chocolate-flavour hot springs  mantou  from Yang Guifei. The secret ingredient is dried lychee.  The big one was made by Yang Guifei, the rest was prepared by her lady attendents, the fire spirits.  The big mantou's appearance is a bit simple. "When you are tired, having sweets and taking a bath is the best ♨. Let's eat the mantou while soaking in the hot spring together! Yes...? That's not what hot spring mantou means? Hmm hmm. On the bright side. The possibility is unlimited♨.

Ito's Sweets.Dialogue: Valentine's chocolate from Sei Shōnagon. Written on the paper coming out of the egg is only a few words. "I ha de omofu zo"───  Even if I'm not saying it out loud, I'm thinking of you. That was the message sent to Shōnagon when she was going through her days of heartbreaks. Those were the strongest magic words, the best cheer-up in the whole world. On that note, the chocolate's taste is ordinary.

Tropical Memoria.Dialogue: Valentine's gift from Mashu. A cake with an ample amount of fruit. While chocolate is enough to make people happy, the sweetness of the fruit helps with healing the mental strains and fatigue. "I wanted to try for a kind of cake that upon looking,  You would be thinking "How fluffy" and then "Seems cheerful" and then "So sparkly"!" Such hard work and kindness makes for the most delicious cake.

Royal Travelling Incognito.Dialogue: "It is not so bad to see the commoner's world once in a while, isn't that right, Sunny?" "Un. It also isn't so bad to drive such a vehicle by using only one's hands!" "Stop making noises! Our disguise is perfect, and yet people are staring at Us strangely!" It is the duty of a king to know the streets of their land. Although they were standing out too much for that to be called an 'incognito travel', with their line-up, they wouldn't have been able to finish this trip peacefully anyway...

Blue Illusion.Dialogue: "Welcome to our magic show. We shall deliver a wondrous moment to you." "It's a long awaited moment, shall we grant that what you wish to see tonight? ―――Well then, will you close your eyes?" Those two magicians cast their magic. When you open your eyes, what's in front of you is...

Effect: Overcharges NP by 1 stage for 1 time.
MLB Effect: Overcharges NP by 1 stage for 1 time.
Exclusive Tailor.Dialogue: "Welcome to the shop.  May I ask what kind of clothing do you require?  No matter the order, we would undertake it with pleasure." In the corner of a certain ancient city. There exists a tailor shop that provides the best service to ladies and gentlemen. All of the employees are elites who dedicate themselves to each and every customers. With the coordinated outfits that they make, you would be able to face any kind of social events with confidence.

Detective Edmond ~Embarking on a New Cha.Dialogue: "Even as a detective, I need some rest, but there's always some mysterious somebody chasing after me." With the Masked Man Case closed, detective Edmond went out on a trip, stopping by a coffee shop owned by an old acquaintance.  He's a detective wishing to speak only of his past cases, and yet, a new request comes from a mysterious French man. He invites the detective to his homeland, and that is the prologue to another big adventure...

My Student Council.Dialogue: "So it says "Lord Jason is the ideal President of the Student Council!". The one who wrote this letter gets it!" "...Somehow I can totally guess who the sender is." Although being the Student Council's President is a bit much for yours truly and I dislike it a little, with the top student prefect of Chiron's classroom, and he-who-basically-doesn't-leave-the-infirmary but is an excellent accountant here, the Student Council has a rock-solid lineup. The cheerful voice of the President, who is also the Captain of the Yacht Club, resound through the Student Council Room today as well.
